project_8.description:
**Title:** Member Technical Staff-wire Harness/cable Harness/technicians: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Job Description for Member Technical - Wire Harness & Fabrication Position Introduction: Rossell Techsys is the Aerospace and Defence (A&D) Division of Rossell India Limited (www.rossellindia.com). Rossell Techsys is based out of the technology hub of India - Bangalore.Rossell Techsys employs a little under 100 staff members and has aggressive growth plans to meet the emerging challenges of the Indian Aerospace and Defence Industry, including potential offset business in India. Rossell Techsys has four core competency areas - Custom embedded systems product development, Test solution design and development including test jigs, rigs, and simulators, Wire harness engineering & looming and Product Support Services. Rossell Techsys is AS9100 Rev C and IS0 9001, 14001(EMS), 27001(ISMS) certified organisation. Rossell Techsys is a CEMILAC approved design house. Positions: This position is for Member - Staff level as an individual contributor with 2 to 10 years of experience. Qualifications and Credentials: Candidates must be at least Diploma in Electronics and Electrical,with excellent academic credentials, from premier educational institutes. Given the kind of vision that Rossell TechSys has set for itself, candidates must not only be worthy professionals, but fundamentally, mature in all aspects of their personality, be able to work in an invigorating, team oriented, and global engineering environment. A belief of 'competing with one's own self' would be good to start with. Candidates with prior experience in aviation and defense domain would be given preference. Candidate who satisfies at least a part of the technical requirements and most of the personality requirements would be exciting candidates to meet with. Technical Requirements: Mandatory / Primary Skills Hands on experience in wiring harness fabrication with knowledge in various cable finishing tools and techniques such as crimp, solder, splicing, potting, sleeving, printing, Connectorisation, etc Knowledge of wire harness components and manufacturing process used in the cable industry is a must. Experience in Aircraft Looms and RF cables will be a plus. Knowledge on Wire Harness In process Inspection stages IPC/WHMA-620 A trained candidate will be a huge plus. Must have worked in an ISO 9001-2008 QMS environment. Experience with AS9100B will be a huge plus. As at this time, we are not working in shifts, however, over time, this position entails working in shifts. Secondary Skills Domain skills in the Aviation and Defense sector. Mechanical CAD design experience will be a huge plus. A fearless attitude to engineering related work. Yet having the good use of common sense and knowing when to take the risk and when not to. Personality Requirements: Candidate must have good communication skills Must have a positive attitude and display maturity in understanding that organizational goals and objectives take precedence to individual goals and objectives. Compensation: Selected Candidates shall be offered benchmark compensation packages and rewards for high performance. Joining Time: Selected Candidates are expected to join within 2 to 4 weeks. References: Selected Candidates will be required to provide a minimum of 2 references on employment. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Aviation / Aerospace Firms Functional Area: Production , Manufacturing , Maintenance Role Category:Production/Manufacturing/Maintenance Role:Workman/Foreman/Technician Keyskills WIRE HARNESS CRIMPING SOLDERING SLPICING technician potting sleeving cable harness wiring harness Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Diploma - Any Specialization, Electrical, Electronics/Telecommunication Company Profile: Agile HR consultancy Pvt. project_11.description:
**Title:** Business Development Manager: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this LimeTray is a product-start-up helping restaurants market, engage and sell to more customers online. 6 out of 10 restaurants shut down in less than a year of starting up & this is not because they serve bad food or are expensive but because they fail to reach out to enough customers to cover costs. With its data driven products and services, LimeTray makes it easier for such restaurants to tap the customer base that now lives online. LimeTray has been one of the fastest growing start-ups in India, and is present Pan India in cities like Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Chandigarh, Jaipur and other cities; in the period of only 2 years and 6 months; with around 250+ employees all over India. Our founding team consists of ISB, NSIT alumni with strong-domain knowledge having built one of the largest online food ordering portal before and we count very successful internet entrepreneurs as our angel investors & advisors. We are also backed by Matrix Partners, one of the top 5 VC firms in India. When you work with us, you work with a peer group that comprises of people who have previously worked at companies like McKinsey & Company, JP Morgan, Bain & Company, Zomato, FoodPanda and Rocket Internet We manage a 1200+ clientele which includes Big Brands like Burger King, Subway, Brekkie, MK Dabbawala, Krispe Kreme, Tummy Kart, Leopold Cafe, Kaati Zone, Rolls on Wheels, Bhukkad, Beijing Bites, The Chocolate Room, Calvins, Khan Saheb, Night Panda, Tikki TIkki, and many more. We at LimeTray believe in the power of Hustle, Hunger and Ambition. We are excited to face new challenges to further explore our potential and think beyond. Everyone in the team hence has a very high sense of ownership & is given a lot of responsibilities. So, now we are looking for energetic, self motivated and passionate people who can join us quick and get the magic started Responsibilities - Personally contact and secure new business accounts/orders through a relationship-based approach. - Demonstrate products and services to existing and potential customers and assist them in selecting those best suited to their needs. - Achieve maximum sales profitability, growth and account penetration within an assigned Territory and/or market segment by effectively selling the company's products and services. Skill Set - We're looking for people who enjoy selling - Courageous, competitive and hungry folk who like to go out, meet people & are able to strike conversations easily - Confidence, diligence and the ability to persevere are key skills - Excellent Communication skills What we offer - Competitive Compensation package - Challenging career path with huge growth opportunities across functions and geographies for high performers - A workplace where you can create a huge impact Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: FMCG / Foods / Beverage Functional Area: Sales , Retail , Business Development Role Category:Retail Sales Role:Sales/Business Development Manager Keyskills Business Development Management Sales Selling Profitability New Business Communication Skills Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate, MBA/PGDM - Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Premium LimeTray is a product-startup helping restaurants market, engage and sell to more customers online. 6 out of 10 restaurants shut down in less than an year of starting up & this is not because they serve bad food or are expensive but because they fail to reach out to enough customers to cover costs. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

project_22.description:
**Title:** Java Developer - Spring/mvc/hibernate: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Experience: 5 to 8 years Job Description We are looking for an experienced JAVA/WEB developer who can act as a dedicated resource on a project and play a role on the support team. This developer will be focused on providing support and enhancements for existing Java Web applications, as well as work on building new applications. The applications will span different business functions (commercial, manufacturing, general corporate services, etc). A combination of technologies will be leveraged, including Spring/Spring MVC, XML, SQL, Hibernate/JPA, Maven, Web Services (SOAP & REST) Monsanto's business is complex; therefore candidates must have strong technical experience and be able to quickly learn new processes in order to be successful in this role. The candidate will need to be able to handle both an agile/flexible environment and also a more formal process driven environment. The candidate will be responsible for owning assigned development tasks, understanding business requirements, developing reliable solutions, performing unit testing, identifying and resolving issues, assisting with compatibility testing, and defining/driving enhancements and configurations. **Title:** Devops Engineer: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Role purpose : The 1FBSSPL DevOps Engineer (DOE) will manage and maintain software development systems, java-based application servers, and apache web servers. Reports to: Senior General Manager (IT Head - India) Working Hours: 2:00pm 11:00pm Reported by: Nil (Individual Contributor Role) Job Overview : The 1FBSSPL DevOps Engineer (DOE) will manage and maintain software development systems, java-based application servers, and apache web servers. The DevOps Engineer will assist in the design of robust java-based application architectures that use Weblogic, TIBCO BusinessWorks, F5 network devices, and apache web servers. The DOE will work to improve the operation and reliability of software development systems and application servers through automated monitoring and automation of common tasks. Essential Functions and Responsibilities : Build new software development systems and upgrade and patch existing systems. Act as liaison between software development groups and the Operations group to resolve issues with system configuration and behavior. Configure, patch, and maintain Linux-based application servers and other development servers. Work closely with U.S. based software development teams and Operations personnel to insure development environments are correctly configured. Be quick to recognize tasks which can be automated and then automate them to reduce manual effort and improve repeatability. Conduct performance and fault analysis on applications with the assistance of software developers. Deploy web applications in a clustered and load balanced N-Tier infrastructure Write and maintain documentation involving job related functions. Job Requirements : Minimum 5 years of total relevant experience. Three years of experience in a previous DevOps role working with UNIX/linux servers and with java applications on Weblogic application servers. Experience writing complex shell scripts. Weblogic Java Application Server administration and tuning experience. Expert level understanding of networking/distributed computing concepts and client/server applications Linux administration experience (e.g. Ubuntu, RedHat/CentOS) with a focus on web (Apache) and Ansible would be a plus. Experience with Nagios, writing Nagios Scripts Understanding of protocols and technologies like HTTP, SSL, LDAP, JDBC, Servlet/JSP, HTML, XML Understand application clustering/load balancing concepts and technologies Excellent verbal and written communications skills in English are required. Ability to handle change and a self-starting attitude are required. Ability to work independently and also coordinate with others and to prioritize projects as well as combining research and expertise to assist organization. A passion for providing excellent service Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Release Manager Keyskills Ansible Unix Python Scripting continuous integration build and deployment build and release and deployment Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Company Profile: IFB Support Services Pvt. project_52.description:
**Title:** VP - Program/project/product Management - Ecommerce - Iit/iim/fms: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this VP Program / Project / Product Management - Defects Reductions for an Ecommerce MNC in Bangalore. Job description : Defect Reduction team, you will lead a team of Program managers and analysts responsible for shaping the strategy and direction of customer-facing products that are core to the customer experience. You will bring innovation, a strategic perspective, a passionate voice, and an ability to prioritize and execute on a fast-moving set of priorities, competitive pressures, and operational initiatives. You will partner closely with product and technology teams to define and build innovative and delightful experiences for customers. You must be highly analytical, able to work extremely effectively in a matrix organization, and have the ability to break complex problems down into steps that drive product development at speed. You will set the tempo for defect reduction through continuous improvement and drive accountability across multiple business units in order to deliver large scale high visibility/ high impact projects. You will lead by example to be just as passionate about operational performance and predictability as you will be about all other aspects of customer experience Responsibilities : Drive effective teamwork, communication, collaboration and commitment across multiple disparate groups with competing priorities. Effectively manage customer expectations and resolve conflicts that balance client and company needs. Drive team to manage large programs, dependencies and bottlenecks, provide escalation management, anticipate and make trade-offs, balance the business needs versus technical constraints. Develop process to effectively maintain and disseminate project information to stakeholders. Be successful in a delivery focused environment and determining the right processes to make the team successful. This opportunity requires excellent technical, problem solving, and communication skills. The candidate is not just a policy maker/spokesperson but drives to get things done. Possess superior analytical abilities and judgment. Use quantitative and qualitative data to prioritize and influence, show creativity, experimentation and innovation, and drive projects with urgency in this fast-paced environment. Build and manage a very strong team of program managers and analysts who use data and metrics to drive decision-making and innovate on behalf of the customer. Partner with key stakeholders to develop the vision and strategy for customer experience on our platforms. Influence product roadmaps based on this strategy along with your teams. This leader will lead the organization through change, evolution, and sustained growth. The right leader will evolve and scale the organization along with the business. With the business growing rapidly, this leader will not have the luxury of having a tunnel-vision for any one area; rather, this individual will need to exhibit excellent judgment on how to prioritize between competing priorities Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Internet / Ecommerce Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Senior Management Role:Head/VP/GM-Operations Keyskills Operations Strategy Product Management Product Development Program Management Desired Candidate Profile Desired Candidate Profile :B.Tech / MBA from top Schools like IIT, IIM, FMS, XLRI, etc, only..MBA with 10+ years of experience in Program / Project / Product management and leadership/ people management preferably in the Ecommerce industry, startup experience preferred. Not looking for Technical Program Managers i.e. experience in IT Infrastructure Programs / Software Program Management are not preferred, but for someone who is more on the business / management side.Experience with complex problem solving and analysis using statistical methods, financial modeling, and network optimization modelingExperience with design and operation of complex operating processesPresentation and written communication skills are essential: clear, organized, concise with an ability to adapt to appropriate audienceExperience working cross functionallyAnalytical and quantitative skills; ability to use hard data and metrics to back up assumptions and develop/ present business casesExperience managing a team of program managers to deliver results and measure their successStrong attention to detail including precise and effective customer communications and proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneouslyHistory of teamwork and willingness to roll up one's sleeves to get the job doneFrom a business perspective, this leader will:Have a strong track record of shaping business strategy for technical products or services and possess a strong understanding of the industryBe conversant with internet technologiesHave an entrepreneurial spiritHave excellent collaborative skills as a leaderBe extremely passionate about offering the best experience to customersAttract, hire and develop a team of terrific Program Managers Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Any Specialization PG:MBA/PGDM - Any Specialization Company Profile: Search Light Leading client of Search Light Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

project_59.description:
**Title:** Manager Business Analytics: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this CE Mission Statement : To build India's most loved fashion brand by offering differentiated customer experience. Relevance : - Customer experience has been acknowledged as the core driver of Myntra's growth and more so going forward as we become an engagement platform rather than just a fashion retailer. CE is central to shaping the overall company direction by interacting with ALL departments (category, catalog, supply chain, tech.) to incubate and drive differentiation projects, and drive improvement initiatives - Illustrative projects that the team is working on setting up a fashion services marketplace, setting up an internal MR / Voice of Customer service line, driving differentiation projects like scheduled deliveries / alterations, operational improvements at the call center Team : - Team is a mix of people to mirror the overall org-so it has people from tech (product managers), usablity experts, fashion and retail professionals, supply chain experts and a pool of Business Analysts who provide generalist problem solving and project management skills. We have an extremely strong team-our Business Analysts are all from BCGand our CE team is headed by an ex-McKinsey Associate Partner. What we are looking for : - First and foremost,problem solving ability- they will be dealing with a very ambiguous set of problems (eg, setting up fashion services marketplace), Very action oriented (we will have a bunch of things that keep coming-up taking them to closure is a critical skill) Strong project management skills and communication / influencing skills. - Tech orientation is a must, past background in tech is not mandatory but preferred. Career progression : - We see this as a central talent pool which we are developing. One will get exposure to all aspects of the business in this role, and after 1.5 years or so, we expect (and will actively support) our BAs to move into different functions OR start playing leadership roles the businesses that are being incubated by this team. This team has great visibility internally and therefore the movement opportunities will be plentiful. Responsibilities : - Define business problems for CE and define key metrics and indicators for measurement - Conduct analysis for assigned business problem by collecting data from all internal and external sources and perform analysis to get answers to business questions. - Put together excel models for business scenario analysis - Conduct Market research for an assigned topic to dig out relevant data and analytics - Deeper analysis of consumer behaviors & trends, by reviewing the internal & external data All roles require : - Strong communication skills (verbal & written) - Strong Analytical Skills and Process Orientation - The ability to thrive in a fast-paced, start-up environment Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Internet / Ecommerce Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Operations Role:Business/EDP Analyst Keyskills Data Analytics Customer Experience Business Analysis Project Management Market Research Call Center Customer Service Process Orientation Strong Communication Skills Supply Chain Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:MBA/PGDM - Any Specialization Company Profile: Myntra Designs Pvt. Ltd. Introduction Myntra is a one stop shop for all your fashion and lifestyle needs. Being India's largest e-commerce store for fashion and lifestyle products, Myntra aims at providing a hassle free and enjoyable shopping experience to shoppers across the country with the widest range of brands and products on its portal. The brand is making a conscious effort to bring the power of fashion to shoppers with an array of the latest and trendiest products available in the country. Value Proposition Myntra's value proposition revolves around giving consumers the power and ease of purchasing fashion and lifestyle products online. Offerings such as the largest in-season product catalogue, 100% authentic products, cash on delivery, EMI facility and 30 day return policy make Myntra, the preferred shopping destination in the country. To make online shopping easier for you, a dedicated customer connect team is on standby to answer your queries 24x7. Brands Myntra understands its shoppers' needs and caters to them with choice of apparel, accessories, cosmetics and footwear from over 500 leading Indian and international brands. Prominent brands include Adidas, Nike, Puma, Catwalk, Inc 5, United Colors of Benetton, FCUK, Timberland, Avirate, FabIndia and Biba to name a few. You can also shop from some recently introduced labels such as - Roadster, Sher Singh, Dressberry, Kook N Keech and ETC. Recognitions - Awarded 'Fashion eRetailer of the Year 2013' by Franchise India - Indian eRetail Awards - Awarded 'Best E-commerce Website for 2012' by IAMAI - India Digital Awards - Awarded 'Images Most Admired Retailer of the Year: Non-Store Retail' for 2012 by Images Group - Awarded 'Best E-commerce Partner of the year 2011-12' by Puma India Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details
**Experience:** 5 years

**Title:** Exciting Career Opportunity for RTL Design Engineers | Bangalore: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this RTL Engineer in -ASIC Flows LINT CDC (Clark Domain Crossing) DRC rule checking & Synthesis using RTL compiler Develop micro-architecture and RTL implementation  Block level/ full chip integration and design. Experience on ASIC  At least 3+ years experience with design, verification and timing tools such as those from Synopsys/Cadence Hands-on with Lint, CDC, LEC and preferably Low Power check tools Some experience of AXI/AHB design in System Verilog and timing, performance & power optimizations Good understanding of design implementation flows and tools (Synthesis, STA, and DFT) Good knowledge of configuration tools and workflow tools: Clearcase/ClearQuest, etc. Desired Skills Knowledge of Networks on Chip Fabric, I/O protocols like SDCC/DDR/USB/UART/SPI etc. would be a plus Work with functional verification team to review test plans and coverage Ability to explain the designs and document their functionality once they are complete.  Scripting experience - Perl or Tcl  CPU and debugging experience Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Semiconductors / Electronics Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded , EDA , VLSI , ASIC , Chip Design Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Database Architect/Designer Keyskills System Verilog Synthesis ASIC RTL Design CDC LINT DRC ASIC Flows Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Any Specialization PG:M.Tech - Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Enlivening Technologies Pvt Ltd About us: Enlivening Technologies Private Limited (ISO 9001 2008 Certified**) Enlivening Technologies (An Essel Group Company) has been formed by a group of highly experienced Automotive and Aerospace & Defence technologists with an aim to provide "Apt & Innovative"- mechanical, electrical and embedded solutions to Automotive, Aerospace and Defence Industry. Enlivening's vision is to provide top of the pyramid engineering consulting, solutions and services to the industries yielding cost effective products. We can support the industry innovate the product realization in a manner that addresses the challenges viz. time-to-market, lower costs, high technology and quality. Enlivening aims to provide complete end-to-end solutions through its committed eco-system. For more information, please visit http://www.enliveningtech.com/ We primarily serve engineering domains: mechanical, electronics & communication, embedded systems, control systems and the intersections of them. Our expertise includes integrated development and optimization from all relevant perspectives driven by systems thinking. Enlivening supports its clients with comprehensive portfolio covering the complete life cycle of the metallic/ composite product from concept design, preliminary design, detailed design, simulations, optimization, digital manufacturing, 3-D modelling and 2-D engineering & manufacturing drawings, prototyping and product qualification through required testing. In the electronics & communications, and control systems domain, Enlivening has hardware and software product design/co-design & development expertise for all life cycle processes/stages that includes Requirements capture, analysis, simulation, design, implementation, Verification & Validation (V&V) design & execution, virtual analytical integration & testing, product data management and technical documentation. Enlivening team's expertise makes it the best strategic partner to Indian defence Systems and other global customers in the field of military electronics domain. project_112.description:
**Title:** Controller: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Basic Function:â€¯The controller position is responsible for the accounting operations of the firm, including the production of periodic financial reports, maintenance of an adequate system of accounting records, and a comprehensive set of controls and budgets designed to mitigate risk, enhance the accuracy of the firm's reported financial results, and ensure that reported results comply with generally accepted accounting principles or international financial reporting standards. Management 1. Maintain a documented system of accounting policies and procedures 2. Manage outsourced functions 3. Oversee the operations of the accounting department, including the design of an organizational structure adequate for achieving the department's goals and objectives Transactions 1. Ensure that accounts payable are paid in a timely manner and based on internal analysis to establish appropriate priorities 2. Ensure that all reasonable discounts are taken on accounts payable 3. Ensure that accounts receivable are collected promptly 4. Ensure that payroll is processed in a timely manner 5. Ensure that periodic bank reconciliations are completed 6. Ensure that required debt payments are made on a timely basis 7. Maintain the chart of accounts 8. Maintain an orderly accounting filing system 9. Maintain a system of controls over accounting transactions Reporting 1. Issue timely and complete financial statements 2. Coordinate the preparation of the corporate annual report 3. Recommend benchmarks against which to measure the performance of company operations 4. Calculate and issue financial and operating metrics 5. Manage the production of the annual budget and forecasts 6. Calculate variances from the budget and report significant issues to management 7. Provide for a system of management cost reports 8. Provide financial analyses as needed, in particular for capital investments, pricing decisions, and contract negotiations Compliance 1. Coordinate the provision of information to external auditors for periodic audits 2. Monitor debt levels and compliance with debt covenants 3. Comply with local, state, and federal government reporting requirements in India Desired Qualifications:â€¯The controller candidate should have a Bachelor's degree in accounting or business administration, or equivalent business experience and 10+ years of progressively responsible experience for a major company or law firm, or division of a large corporation.â€¯ This position also requires native English speaking and writing. Preference will be given to candidates with the Certified Public Accountant or Certified Management Accountant designations. Experience with Concur and/or Net Suite is a huge plus, as is an advanced degree. Big 4 experience preferred. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Legal Functional Area: Accounts , Finance , Tax , Company Secretary , Audit Role Category:Senior Management Role:Head/VP/GM-CFO/Financial Controller Keyskills Accounting Operations Accounts Payable Finance Accounts Receivable Auditing Budgeting Financial Statements Financial Reporting Payments Banking Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.A - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate, MBA/PGDM - Any Specialization, Finance Company Profile: LAYFIELD BARRETT KPO SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED Layfield & Barrett is one of the leading personal injury law firms in the United States with offices located in California, Arizona and Utah. With decades of experience in successfully negotiating and litigating a variety of personal injury claims. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

project_121.description:
**Title:** Machine Learning & NLP Expert -candidates From Premier Institutes Only: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Overview: As we continue to expand our artificial intelligence platform, Amelia, we are looking for NLP experts to join our development team. We need great scientists who also are great coders. Our scientists tackle the big challenges in deep language understanding and are passionate about writing sustainable code to implement advanced ideas. Whether from published research or their own approaches, our scientists identify and integrate the best science available all to create the best new NLP capability possible. We are looking for a hands-on scientist and developer ready to tackle the big challenges in deep language understanding. With an extensive existing customer base and a market-leading position in help desk automation, your work will go into production as soon as it shows measurable improvement over current methods. We think long term, while putting our research into practice on a rational schedule. Responsibilities: The ideal candidate will have both a research and development background. Having a history of peer-reviewed scientific publications in NLP is a plus. We have interest in candidates with a machine learning background and approach to NLP. We are also interested in candidates with a rule-based NLP background and knowledge of linguistic semantics. We have interest in candidates with experience in many portions of the NLP pipeline, including parsing, word sense disambiguation, knowledge extraction, question answering and language generation. Open source development experience is a plus. Ability to code in Java is required. You will lead an area of development of the pipeline, guiding and mentoring junior developers, working with the leads of the other areas of the pipeline and the lead scientist to create and deploy new capabilities in language understanding. You should be passionate about writing good and sustainable code to implement your advanced ideas. You will be expected to identify and integrate the best science available, whether from published research or your own approach. You will work with test and analysis engineers to prove your ideas against objective and measurable tests of capability. Each day you will be expected to move as needed between designing scientific approaches and architecture, writing or contributing to scientific publications, mentoring, and development in Java, all in the service of creating the best new NLP capability possible. Good scientists must also be good communicators, able to explain and justify complex ideas to junior developers and senior management, both verbally and in writing. You should be comfortable defining delivery schedules and metrics for performance assessment and meeting your targets. First and foremost we need great scientists who also are great coders. A mature coder should be able to learn a new framework quickly, so experience with each of the items below just helps us understand your implementation experience, but each is desirable. o -Development tools such as Maven, Jenkins, Ant, Eclipse o -Comfortable on Apple or Linux OSes o -Java Spring, Guava, JDBC, Tomcat, JUnit Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Computer Science from IIT/ IISc/ NITs/ Bits/ DCE/ ITBHU/ Guindy / Top US universities 1-3 Years Experience in Machine Learning and NLP Salary:INR 12,00,000 - 22,00,000 P.A Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills Machine Learning nlp natural language processing Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Computers PG:Post Graduation Not Required, M.Tech - Computers Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: IPsoft Global Services Private Limited About Company ABOUT IPSOFT IPsoft is a global, industry-leading managed services company offering a complete solution to enterprise customers for outsourcing global IT operations. We offer a full range of managed services to our clients, from management at the individual component, device and network level to the analysis, design and management of complex business processes. IPsoft's unique (and proprietary) automation technology remediates more than half of the detected exceptions in our managed client environments. We manage our customers' systems through our worldwide Network Operations Centers located in New York City (HQ), London, Amsterdam and Bangalore. IPsoft has been solidly profitable since its inception as a company in 1998, and has roughly doubled its gross revenues for four straight years; we are on a trajectory to continue this rapid growth pace, meaning that you will have an opportunity to grow with the company. CULTURE IPsoft is committed to helping our employees develop their full potential in both business and technical spheres, and it is our policy to recognize excellent performance by promoting from within. IPsoft is a fast-paced, energetic and fun place to work. We're changing the way managed services are delivered to customers, and we're looking for people who want to make a difference. The best evidence that IPsoft is a good place to work? People come to work here and stay. If you come to work at IPsoft, you'll be working with cutting-edge technologies and the bright, driven people who develop them. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details
**Experience:** 3 years

**Must-Have Skills**
- Machine Learning nlp natural language processing Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Computers PG:Post Graduation Not Required

Other Company Benefits Industry: Medical / Healthcare / Hospitals Functional Area: Marketing , Advertising , MR , PR , Media Planning Role Category:Advertising Role:Events/Promotion Executive Keyskills marketing footfall camps flyers BTL ATl event RWA jogger park social clubs Event Marketing branding promotion below the line above the line field marketing catchment area road shows Desired Candidate Profile Graduates / MBA (Sales & Marketing) Experience in Marketing (BTL Activities & Marketing Events)Preferred from Healthcare/ Retail/ Retail HealthcareMust have a BIKE & VALID Driving LicenseField Marketing experience should be of 2 YearsArea KnowledgePlease call me 8500082192 or 8125804444 Company Profile: Apollo Sugar Clinics Limited Make a Career. Join Apollo Sugar India! Apollo Sugar Clinics is an innovative, single specialty diabetes and endocrine healthcare service provider, formed as a collaboration between Apollo Hospitals Group and Sanofi (Global Pharma MNC). Apollo Sugar believes that human capital is the key to the success of our organization. We have built a culture of collaboration between teams that ensures growth of individuals and the organization. Our work environment drives innovation and passion towards patient service. We recruit & engage the best talent pool towards fulfillment of our core objectives - compassion and care of our patients. With the expertise and knowledge of our international partners, we bring global standards, in the field of single specialty clinics. Apollo Sugar is an equal opportunity employer and promotes diversity in our workforce. If you are compassionate with a flair for service excellence that you think can provide healing touch to improve the lives of people around you, Apollo Sugar is the place for you. Join our team to leverage career opportunities and achieve long term success. Our talent pool comprises of specialists in Medical Services, Marketing, Finance, HR, IT, Operations & Quality domain. In our clinics operation, we endeavor to impart quality experience to our multi-disciplinary care specialists comprising Endocrinologists, Diabetologists, Operations Incharges, Patient Care Facilitators, Diabetes Specialist Nurses, Dieticians, Diabetic Educators, and Sales & Marketing lead's with meaningful assignments to enhance their skills and expertise at par with global standards. To know more about your career options, connect with Apollo Sugar HR Partners and discover how successful you can be with us. More About Apollo Sugar (read more at www.apollosugar.com) India is home to over 65 million diabetics and more than 50 million pre-diabetics. More than 30 million Indians are unknown diabetics (not yet diagnosed but afflicted). The need of the hour is to address this endemic with a dedicated, comprehensive model of care - Apollo Sugar Clinics is the answer. Apollo Sugar (An Apollo Group Company) is an innovative care delivery business focused on providing assured care for Diabetics. With 30 years of the Apollo group's heritage and quality healthcare delivery behind it, Apollo Sugar was founded on the vision to make diabetes disease free. We are building the largest pan-India single specialty clinics model for Diabetes. Our vision is 'disease-free diabetes' and our mission is to provide proven and comprehensive care to the diabetic being cared for, and not just the disorder - to keep co-morbidities or related complications of the heart, kidneys, eyes, nerves, feet at bay. We successfully deliver robust patient outcomes by staffing each Sugar clinic with best in class multi-disciplinary care teams of doctors, dieticians, trained diabetes specific nurses and counselors, backed with proven treatment protocols and lifestyle management interventions to enable our customers to keep their Diabetes in good control and live a disease free lifestyle. We currently have 35+ Apollo Sugar clinics that are operational pan India across major cities, and are fast scaling up to our footprint to help provide proven, quality care for millions of more diabetic patients across India. You will: Manage the flow of candidates thorough the recruitment process, from scheduling interviews to bringing new employees on board. Manage onsite logistics during interviews, and ensuring a seamless overall experience for both the candidate and the internal employees. May be required to conduct tests, screening and preliminary interviewing of potential employees. Desired experience: 1-3 years of work experience as recruitment coordinator.Should have be familiar with Microsoft Office.Any prior experience with PeopleSoft ERP will be an advantage.Proficiency in English and any other languages like Hindi/Tamil/Telegu/Kannada.Candidate should be open to travel & working on third party rolls. Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:MBA/PGDM - HR/Industrial Relations Company Profile: Azim Premji Foundation Azim Premji Foundation is a not-for profit organization that has been working for more than a decade now towards making deep, large scale and institutionalized impact on the quality and equity of education in India, along with related development areas. Any large scale educational change requires significant and sustained effort over many decades and can only be achieved through working at multiple levels as well as on several areas simultaneously. The Foundation today works in 8 states and has institutes that are located at Karnataka (Bangalore, Yadgir, Mandya and Gulbarga), Rajasthan (Jaipur, Sirohi, Tonk, Barmer and Rajsamand), Uttarakhand (Dehradun, Uttarkashi, Udham Singh Nagar and Almora), Bihar (Patna), Chhattisgarh (Raipur and Dhamtari), Madhya Pradesh (Bhopal) and Puducherry. At many of the District Institutes, schools have been established for the specific purpose of demonstration. These schools provide quality free education to the local community, at costs and constraints similar to that of rural government schools. Over the next few years, the Foundation plans to have about 50 District Institutes, 30 schools and over 4000 employees. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

**Title:** Product Sourcing Leader: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Role Summary/Purpose: The Product Sourcing Leader is responsible for managing and directing all sourcing activities as related to assigned product segment(s). Key interface between segment and global sourcing to ensure strategies and needs are represented. Scope is segment based, and includes all suppliers and production with the segment portfolio. Essential Responsibilities : Key responsibilities: Key team member in a cross-functional segment team responsible for the interfacing and global owner between Development teams and the Global Operations organization, including leading the key deliverables for sourcing segment for the total product life cycle (NPI & Installed Base). Key focal point for all Supply Chain issues pertaining to NPI installed base component obsolesce and quality, including manage NPI deliverables required to establish an optimal supply chain focused on strategic suppliers with a strategy to achieve target product ICVs for assigned segment. Champion sourcing initiatives early in NPI process to ensure excellence in supplier selection, components, and platform specification including the selection of strategic suppliers and simplification and meeting target costs/management of ICV and variance targets. Integrate the Engineering, Production, and Sourcing objectives in the execution of assigned segment including promoting standardization across programs for supplied product and champion sourcing initiatives early in the NPI process (including supplier P&E), and to ensure excellence in supplier selection and component and platform specification driving supplier capability measurements for assigned programs. Collaborate with engineering to ensure technology match occurs between supply partners and engineering & manufacturings to ensure capable product and factory fulfillment requirements are met. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Medical / Healthcare / Hospitals Functional Area: Supply Chain , Logistics , Purchase , Materials Role Category:Purchase/Material Management Role:Purchase/Vendor Development Manager Keyskills Global Sourcing Production Engineering Supplier Selection Supply Chain Product Sourcing Install Base Target Achievement sourcing Desired Candidate Profile Qualifications/Requirements : Bachelors Degree in Engineering or technical related field. 5 plus years experience in manufacturing engineering, sourcing or engineering. 3 years work experience technical depth/knowledge in assigned segment. Proficiency with Microsoft Excel spreadsheets development and analysis. Willing to travel domestically and internationally up to 25% of time.Quality Specific Goals:1. Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position2. Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines3. Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required4. Knowledge and understanding of GEHC Purchasing Controls Procedure and associated Work Instructions and operates within them to ensure that all purchased product and services conform to specified requirements.5. Develop and maintaining of fully qualified and compliant supply base.Qualifications:1. Bachelors Degree in Engineering or technical discipline, or a Bachelors degree with 5 years work experience in sourcing or procurement or 9 years work experience in sourcing or procurement.2. 3 years work experience with technical depth/knowledge in assigned commodities, or 3 years of Commercial Sourcing, Supply Chain or Engineering experience3. Willing to travel domestically and internationally up to 25% of timePreferred Qualifications:1. Bachelors Degree in Engineering2. Minimum of 7 years of commercial sourcing experience in all facets of the assigned commodities3. Excellent negotiations skills and analytical skills with the ability to manage and develop supplier relationships4. Ability to energize, develop and build rapport at all levels within an organization5. Proven ability to execute and deliver on commitments6. Experience implementing a compliant supply chain7. Greenbelt certification preferredDesired Characteristics: Working experience with development and production with Medical Devices. Practical experience in balancing and optimizing engineering process rigor with product delivery priorities. Excellent program/project management experience with the ability to develop and execute on integrated program plans. Effective problem solving ability to lead and influence others (cross-functionally and globally). Demonstrate strong execution skills and ability to drive change globally. Experience with eNPI, ePDM and Oracle systems. MBA or Master Degree in Technical field. Certified Green Belt. project_176.description:
**Title:** Product Support Specialist - Logistimo: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Looking for a job or career at a fast-growing and highly impactful industry to empower people and society? Are you looking for an opportunity to take ownership and drive results? Look no further because Logistimo is the place for you! Logistimo pioneers mobile and web supply chain technology for rural emerging markets across Healthcare, Consumer goods, Agricultural goods, Waste management and Humanitarian action. Customers include agencies of the UN, Ministries of Health of different countries, Public Health Units, Retailers, Distributors, Transporters, Wholesalers and Producers seeking deeper integration of the first- and last-mile of their value chains. From Asia to Africa, at Logistimo, they apply technology to improve supply chain performance, create greater transparency, decrease operating costs and provide clients with a competitive advantage. Based in Bangalore, Logistimo needs a capable and motivated Product Support Specialist to help provide the best support on the Logistimo product for all its users. Key skills required include an ability to manage product issues or requests raised at various levels and integrate them to the product pipeline in coordination with the engineering team. Another key aspect of the role is to provide all levels of customer support to users including prioritizing escalations, new feature launches, creating easy reference guides/FAQ, user issue analysis etc. Helping to derive client insights and drive process transformation, this role presents a unique opportunity to make a tangible difference in rural healthcare, agriculture, disaster response and beyond. Target salary range is highly competitive (7 - 12L CTC) and will be based on previous experience, subject to customary increases on joining.  This is not a shift based role; you will be working regular office hours (which will be same as rest of Logistimo team). Detailed Responsibilities: Investigate, diagnose and respond to technical questions and issues received from customers  Provide thorough product support across all levels (large technical issues and granular - device related issues)  Promptly answer support related emails , phone calls and other communications  Log reported bugs to the engineering team via bug reporting platforms  Partner with the engineering team to ensure filed bug fixes are completed within the stipulated time frame  Support pilot deployments across new regions with new customers; provide direct and ongoing user support; provide onsite training for users; monitor and report support data across multiple metrics  Gather, consolidate and present data periodically from the customer request tools to internal stakeholders  Design, test and implement improvements in the tools and processes deployed by the customer success team in partnership with multiple stakeholders  Create and update the technical support 'FAQ library' periodically, in collaboration with the internal communications team  Keep abreast of new features and product enhancements Salary:INR 7,00,000 - 12,00,000 P.A. Based on previous experience, subject to customary increases on joining. Industry: Courier / Transportation / Freight / Warehousing Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Voice Role:Associate/Senior Associate -(Technical) Keyskills Supply chain Product management Product support Customer support technical support helpdesk customer support Team lead Email Support email technical Technical Service Manager L3 FAQ Training SAAS Desired Candidate Profile 2-3 years of relevant work experience in an IT/Product support environment. Experience in collaborating with internal teams (product, technical, business, etc) to resolve customer issues is a mustExperience in product management - providing product related (technical)support. project_186.description:
**Title:** Senior Software Engineer / Technical Lead - Java: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Job Summary : The Technical Lead will perform Java based software design, development and deployment tasks. Work Timings :  11:00am to 8:00pm (3 days in a week)  2:00pm 11:00pm (2 days in a week depending on project needs) Experience : Minimum 6 years Key Areas of Responsibility and Accountability The Technical Lead candidate shall work as an individual contributor (approximately 70% of the time) by doing Analysis, Design Development and Unit Tests. 30% of the time shall be spent in mentoring juniors, design and code reviews and participation in discussions on architectural design and maintenance of systems. The Technical Lead role requires the ability to mentor/ help a small team of software engineers through the development lifecycle, driving successful and timely completion of technical tasks. The successful candidate will have the ability to adjust quickly to shifting priorities and multiple deadlines. Should have the ability to understand, explain and communicate technical concepts. The incumbent must have significant hands-on technical experience in all phases of the software development life cycle of enterprise-wide applications. This includes having the ability to interpret design application architectures, to incorporate best of breed technologies capable of meeting business requirements, to contribute to system performance and to resolve technical issues. Skill and experience requirements   Ability to program in all tiers of a typical J2EE application (Front-end, Business layer and O/R mapping/DAO layer) Write new code and enhance existing code Design code using core design patterns Maintain disciplined software engineering practices in day to day development work Perform functional design review, code reviews & unit tests Perform process reviews to ensure that software engineering processes meet changing business conditions and remain consistent with industry best practices Minimum seven years of industry experience in object-oriented software design and development. Experience with Web Logic or Oracle 10gAS and an excellent understanding of database technologies and persistence techniques. Thorough understanding of technical concepts as they apply to N-tier distributed computing and to end-to-end performance, availability, reliability, security, integration and configurability of software applications. Excellent conceptual understanding and extensive hands-on experience with Java, XML, EJB, JSP, Servlets, JMS/MQ, JDBC, Struts, spring, Hibernate, Ajax and other J2EE technologies. Proficiency with both NT and UNIX environments, including software deployment and execution. Experience in development using TIBCO BusinessWorks integration tool will be advantage. Associated requirements   Establish an environment of learning and growth keeping organizational values and operating policies in mind. Facilitate and support the delivery of excellent quality product releases Review team members implementation to ensure they follow the design and coding guidelines. Work with developers to resolve their technical issues & mentor them. Work with QA to improve test plans. Report work status on technical tasks to program manager. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Team Lead/Technical Lead Keyskills JSP Servlets Java Struts Hibernate J2Ee Spring JDBC JMS EJB Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Company Profile: IFB Support Services Pvt. Ltd. 1FB Support Services Private Limited (1FBSSPL) is a small format, and multi-discipline BPO/ KPO organization. The Company is engaged in the business of providing information technology management services, risk management services and contact centre based customer support and collection services to its parent 1st Financial Bank USA (1FBUSA). 1FBUSA is an FDIC-insured, state-chartered bank headquartered in Dakota Dunes, South Dakota, founded in 1910. It has multiple subsidiary operations in various locations across the United States. The bank is a leading provider of financial services to college students and graduates from coast to coast, and is committed to providing quality community banking services in South Dakota. 1FBSSPL offers you the opportunity to learn the credit card business, work with the latest technology, build new applications and systems, interact with US colleagues and have a direct impact on business outcomes in a collegial, family atmosphere and state-of-the-art work environment. **Title:** Academy Chairman - NGO: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this JOB Description : Our reputed NGO client - under the umbrella Group started by one of the co-founders of Infosys is looking to hire a highly skilled and passionate social cause evangelist and leader. Is this you- Position : Chairman - Academy Reporting to : CEO - Foundation About the Organization : - The NGO is a school of repute in imparting training for children with neuro developmental disabilities. The school aims to improve the access to schools for all such children regardless of their background. Having been in this domain for over a decade, as a logical expansion, it has spread its wings in the following areas to accommodate and enrich the lives of differently abled members of the Society : - Vocational Centre to enable the physically and mentally challenged to lead a life of dignity, self-worth and self-reliance by providing training and employment. - Reach out to nearby villages and extend the service. - To provide rehabilitation support services for persons with severe disabilities, to train in skill areas such as wheel chair mobility, to provide ample opportunities to develop/improve/maintain socialisation skills. - Academy - a Centre of Excellence for educating, training and empowering all stakeholders in the area of special needs. The key responsibilities of the Chairman of Academy, include the following : Strategy : - Develop Strategy to meet the Vision of the Academy by conducting appropriate training courses/ workshops to create/ develop resources in the area of Special Education for Intellectually/ Differently Abled children Financial : To ensure the financial viability of the Academy : - By choosing to run the courses that are viable - By choosing the elite programs in the Special Education Sector, even if it requires cross subsidy; by conducting viable courses - By seeking sponsorships for the students/ courses from various bodies/ government Process : - Supporting the Senior Leadership in management of initiatives/ staff - Design and develop policies for driving the Academy through strong processes and continually improve them - Challenging and monitoring the performance of the academy on a regular basis Succession Planning : Identify and develop second in line successors, at various levels. General : - Delegate authority and responsibility to the Director/ Teachers and Staff in the day-to-day management of the school and review for lapses and improvements. **Title:** Sr FPGA Engineer - Bangalore: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this We have an urgent requirement for Sr FPGA Engineer for reputed Semiconductor Company in Bangalore. Designation: Sr FPGA Engineer Experience: 6+ Yrs Location: Bangalore Company Name: Our client is a reputed Semiconductor company (800+ Employees) Job Description: - A self-motivated BE / B Tech candidate with 6 to 8 Years of Experience in FPGA FW implementation using industry popular tools such as Altera / Xilinx. - Strong Electrical engineering fundamentals and exposure on complete FPGA Code Development cycle from conceptualization to realization - Proven experience in designing VHDL for highly complex systems with FPGA implementation - Good experience in (MIPS / ARM / Power PC) Processor based systems & good Debugging skill - Hands-on experience in one or more of the industry standard Hi-Speed interfaces such as DDR-2, DDR-3, SATA, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Display Port, PCI-e, GB-Ethernet (10BASE-T / 100BASE-TX/1000BASE-T) etc., - Proficiency with selecting right target device for the given application. - Good mentoring, Communication Skill and Team work Knowledge on Programming concepts and C language a plus (not desired) Responsibilities: - Responsible for designing, developing, and implementing cost-effective complex systems using FPGAs with hi-speed interface standards. - Should be able to visualize top level requirements in detail and guide the team towards achieving the goal of implementing the architecture successfully. - Identifies test and diagnostic programs required at various stages of the module integration in targeted FPGA. - The job involves debug at VHDL / Gate level and bring up, co-ordination with Device vendors, Device programming /targeting new device samples for new designs etc. - Candidate should be able to come up with effort estimate on complex system design projects and identify right resources in-house for the activities involved & guide the team to achieve the goal resulting in success of the organization. The successful candidate will be a person who works well with global and cross-functional teams of project or product manager, business managers, operations, and software development, has an extremely high level of customer focus and a passion for process improvement. In addition, they enjoy and excel at diving into data to identify root causes, derive patterns, and determine long-term solutions that ensure superior customer experience. **Title:** Process jobs in Leading Company for International Voice Process: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this International voice process jobs in banking process Perks and benefits: Salary: Irrespective of experience if you get through the interview salary will be 3.3 lakhs per annum (22k take home) Allowance, Incentives, Cab facility, Attendance bonus We have huge openings for Banking voice process jobs where You will be the first point of contact to the International customers of the bank You can get associated with International and domestic banks and explore the greater avenues in the field of banking You can synchronize your good speaking skills or relevant exp in voice process with the wish to make your career in banking sector The process is basically into inbound process not in outbound Pre-requisites to apply for this job Are you a graduate if not do you have voice process experience then you can apply! Looking for Candidate with excellent communication skills in english We are looking for immediate joiners!! Should be willing to work in UK shift Note: IKYA Human capital solutions is one of the top recruitment service providing organisation in India and when we say service we dont charge anything. We just help you to get the relevant job Job location: Bangalore Eligibility: Fresher/Experienced Shifts: UK shift Customer service in banking process Customer service is an important, but broad concept in the banking industry. In essence, banks are service-based businesses, so most of their activities involve elements of service. Customer service managers generally deal directly with service issues, but several other common banking jobs involve service. Banking process is a highly specialized sourcing strategy used by banks and lending institutions to support the business acquisition and account servicing activities associated with the customer lending lifecycle. These specific services are usually offered through multi-year service-level agreements of the financial services market. **Title:** Lead Engineer: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Title: Senior Software Engineer, JAVA/J2EE Location: Bangalore Responsibilities: Participate in Design and Development of new features in the product. Must be able to analyze business issues and technical problems independently, and come up with smart, logical solutions. Should have Strong problem solving capability. Design and develop enterprise class applications using Java/J2EE, XML and Database related technologies. Be able to contribute as strong hands-on technical member in project development activities. Participate in Product releases through requirement reviews, development, deployment, setting up environments; documenting release notes and technical details regarding functionality and configuration. Responsible for Quality of the code. Review test plans with QA & drive the code reviews within the team. Should be able to execute assigned tasks in a timely & efficient manner. Develop strong expertise in at least one more modules within the product. Effectively communicate status, metrics and issues on a regular basis. Mentor junior engineers and guide them with their assignments. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Team Lead/Technical Lead Keyskills Java J2Ee XML Database Software Engineering Code Review Project Development Design Development Problem Solving Desired Candidate Profile Knowledge and Skills: Strong hands-on experience with one or many J2EE application/web servers (Apache/JBoss/Tomcat/WebLogic) including configuration, deploying and debugging. Strong hands-on experience in coding and debugging J2EE applications. Key requirement is an ability to quickly learn and stay current with new technologies. Hands experience on the UI technologies like JavaScript, HTML, JQuery Strong hands on experience on writing complex SQL queries(Oracle/MySQL) Strong hands on experience on Spring Framework. Strong hands on experience on REST Services Strong hands on experience on JPA Good exposure to Data Structures and algorithms Working knowledge on the Design patterns. Good exposure to unit testing using JUnit Framework Ability to work in a high-paced dynamic environment with broad level requirements, deadlines, pressures etc. Working knowledge of Linux/Solaris environments Working knowledge on the tuning of the SQL Queries Must have experience with Version Control systems preferably GIT Need to have excellent team orientation skills. Good Communication Skills required. Highly motivated, a Go-Getter who needs no supervision. Understanding of the large scale server side deployment architecture. Exposure to server clusters and scalability issues is a plus. Prior experience being part of a product development team is a big plus. Exposure to performance tuning & resolving production issues in previous engagements is a plus Exposure to working on high volume data driven applications will be a plus. Experience in Mongo Database will be a plus. Experience in R-Programming will be a plus. project_350.description:
**Title:** Job Opening for Ad Operations (programmatic Buying and Team Lead): Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Dear Candidate, We have openings for Ad operations: 1. Programmatic Buying for Ad operations 2. Team Lead for Ad operations We are looking for only experienced Male Candidates in the same domain. These positions are completely for Night Shift - USA Market . Interested Experienced candidates can contact us on this number:  Mobile: 9886652876; Land line: 080- 46430999 Extension: 208. Experience Required: More than 3+ years in Ad operations who must be knowing End to End Trafficking and client facing. Roles and Responsibilities of Programmatic Buying: In this role, the analyst will be a key contributor to our growing Ad Operations team. The Campaign Optimization role will be responsible for testing, implementing, and tracking online and mobile ad campaigns in DBM, AppNexus & Brighrol ad server. The ideal candidate will be focused, detail oriented, accountable, and can bring an ownership mentality to the table. Traffic online and mobile ad campaigns/creative in DBM, AppNexus & Brightroll ad servers. Perform the day-to-day ad placement, scheduling and updates to the client, including rich media ad placements. Test and troubleshoot the creative to ensure adherence to specifications and proper tracking. Monitor campaigns to ensure full delivery and troubleshoot delivery discrepancies (between first party and third party). Proactively manage bidding (spend smartly) and ensure that the client get more margin. Should have proven knowledge on the campaign optimization techniques (daily pacing, identifying fraud sites and creating black list, creating white list with the best performing sites, controlling frequency capping & bidding.etc). Systematically design, implement and document effective campaign management strategies (for CPM,CPA, CPC & CPCV based campaigns) while identifying and analysing opportunities for campaign improvement. Troubleshoot targeting issues, resolve any traffic issues and reconcile discrepancies. Interact with internal as well as external clients including but not limited to coordination and consultation to ensure a successful advertising campaign. Should have basic knowledge on HTML and Javascript. Assist the team by identifying process improvements and efficiencies. Should be strong knowledge on all the functions of Programmatic trafficking. Roles and Responsibilities of Team Lead: Good Ad Trafficking, Online Business Development, good analytical and problem -solving abilities. Should be the owner of trainings and knowledge transfer sessions. Create an environment oriented to trust, open communication, creative thinking, and cohesive team effort. Provide the team with a vision of the project objectives. Motivate and inspire team members. Lead by setting a good example (role model) - behaviour consistent with words. Q management, updating the tickets in Google doc and sending the status emails to the client on pending tickets, confirmation tickets and closed tickets. Create and update the process docs, will share with the team for any new changes in the process. Handels all the client queries (process related) Responsible for QA process.  Provide any training that the team members need. Communicate clear instructions to team members. Monitor the team members' participation to ensure the training he providing is being put into use, and also to see if any additional training is needed Manage the flow of day-to-day work. Maintains internal and external error trackers. Maintains time trackers, ensure that the team is updating correct numbers and on time. Will attend the client calls and keep the data ready. Leave management. Creates the training plan for new jonnies. Escalate issues which cannot be resolved by the team. Provide guidance to the team based on management direction. Coordinates meetings. Work with functional managers to obtain necessary resources to support the team's requirements. Help keep the team focused and on track. Maintain healthy group dynamics. Responsible for uniform distribution of volumes within the team. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Advertising / PR / MR / Event Management Functional Area: Marketing , Advertising , MR , PR , Media Planning Role Category:Senior Management Role:Head/VP/GM/ Mgr-Online/Digital Marketing Keyskills Ad Operations Team Leading Night Shift Programmatic Buying Ad trafficking Quality Analysis Client servicing Campaign Management Campaign Optimization Troubleshooting Team management Online Digital Marketing Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Company Profile: Treble Clef Technology Services Private Limited RESPONSIVE MEDIA TECH SERVICES is an online media technology services company based in New York, with its Operations hub in Bangalore. Responsive operates as a back-office for online media publishers, advertising networks, digital agencies and online marketers around the globe, especially media companies in the US, UK, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific region, mainly Australia. Our services include ad operations, creative, reporting, search marketing, email production and web design & development. Our operations hub in Bangalore operates around the clock as our teams work during the clients' business hours. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details
**Experience:** 3+ years

project_351.description:
**Title:** Lead Data Engineer - Commercial Analytics: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Role Summary/Purpose As a data engineer in the Marketing and Commercial Analytics team you will enable the creation of market insights for Aviation product managers, drive improvements in sales processes through data insights, and generate market intel from disparate data sources in Aviation and across the industry. Essential Responsibilities As a Sr Data Engineer, you will be part of a data engineering or cross-disciplinary team on, typically involving disparate, complex data sets. These teams typically include marketers, computer scientists, software developers, engineers, product managers, Sales specialists and end users, working in concert to deliver market insights, sales plans and product analysis. Potential application areas include long range airline industry forecasts, pricing analysis, sales process insights, and commercial executive metrics. This includes the relationship management with the customers, the management of IM budget and resources as well as IM operations and delivery. To be the single IM Point of Contact with full IM accountability for the Country Board and Management. Main Accountabilities/Measured On: Accountable for all IM aspects in India including relationship management, delivery, production, finance and escalations Accountable for delivery of projects and enhancements Accountable for the stability of IM Operations Accountable for the execution of the IM country strategic plan and all other IM service delivery Quality of service: Achievement of agreed Operational Service Level Agreements (SLAs). Percentage of global solutions utilized or under transition to utilization within his/ her area of responsibility (Everest Roadmap). Support the transformation of the Solution Delivery Management team to ensure successful delivery of projects needed to meet business needs. Own the business case and to collaborate with the business in the formulation of business cases and their prioritization. Measures: - All new SOW submittals are sent in within 24 hours of start date. **Title:** Urgent Opening for SAS Analyst / SAS Programmer - Equifax: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this SAS L2 Job Location : Bangalore Job Summary SAS L2 1. Develops and standardizes various MIS Operations right from identifying sources of reporting till addressing data quality issues. 2. Assists in resolving and reconciling information with financial and business results where appropriate. 3. Mitigate with issues related to MIS Reports and Activities: Accuracy, on time Delivery, Operating Environment and Solutions. 4. Actively lead/participate in all phases of the project cycle: project planning, estimate work efforts, requirements gathering, design, development, testing, and implementation. Skills, Knowledge & Abilities 1. Knowledge of Banking Business concepts, policies and procedures. 2. Hands on in SAS BASE, Macros, SQL is mandatory, exposure in SAS Visual Analytics will be an added advantage. 3. Strong analytical and problem solving skills with the ability to effectively resolve moderately complex situations and issues with data tables. 4. Hands-on in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Access and PowerPoint) and other business-related systems. Knowledge in Excel Macros will be an advantage. 5. Must be results oriented with the ability to self-drive the work independently as well as in a team environment. 6. Detail-oriented with strong Analytical skills, the ability to manage multiple projects effectively and also eager to learn new horizons of technology if necessary. 7. Strong interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills with the ability to effectively interact with Finance, Information Technology, Frontline and other staff and departments. Essential Duties & Responsibilities 1. Design, Develops and Produce MIS Reports for Larger Retail Consumer Banking Business 2. Develops and executes effective reporting to reconcile operational and financial data from several sources to obtain and report financial results and adhere to regulatory reporting requirements. 3. Incorporates advanced theoretical concepts, rules to interpret reconciled data and develops various scenarios to illustrate the conclusions by submitting findings and interpretations for review. 4. Independently identifies and investigates issues related to projects. Selects approach from accepted body of methodology or recommends alternatives which include system identification, remediation of issues, and reconciliation/documentation of analysis and resolution. 5. Prepares, analyzes, and reviews data quality and accuracy of MIS reports which includes system and financial statement reconciliations. 6. Participates in the development of presentations, report layouts, definitions and documentation. 7. May perform additional reconciliations, maintenance and inventory of various reports to improve the efficiency of distribution and Management Information Systems related processes. Education & Experience 1. Overall 2-4 years of experience in Financial/MIS analysis experience 2. Of which, 2+ years of techno-functional experience of SAS within Banking Industry. 3. Bachelor's Degree, preferably in Finance and/or MIS, or equivalent. 4. Project Management experience will be a plus point.
