**Title:** Admin, HR & Finance Controller: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Overview: Datamar India is looking for experienced and skilled Admin, HR & Finance Controller who can coordinate office operations and procedures, in order to ensure organizational effectiveness, efficiency and safety. The ideal candidate will be experienced in handling a wide range of administrative and executive support related tasks and will be able to work independently with little or no supervision. This person must be exceedingly well organized, flexible and enjoy the administrative challenges of supporting an office of diverse people. Datamar India is a data and market intelligence provision company working in the maritime and foreign trade sector with a focus on the East Coast of South America. The company partners with major transport companies such as ship and port operators to gather, process and distribute data that helps organizations make decisions on strategic, commercial and operational matters. Responsibilities: Admin, HR & Finance Controller will be responsible for overseeing the full range of maintaining and enhancing the organizations Administration, Finance and Human Resources by planning, implementing, and evaluating employee relations and human resources policies, programs and practices. Admin, HR & Finance Controller will also be part of the senior management team and will have the opportunity to bring an HR and Administrative perspective to the organisation. Administration: Oversee office in maintaining files and centralized databases Manage office facilities administration Serves as the go-to for office inquiries and conflicts Plan and coordinate administrative procedures and systems and devise ways to streamline processes Manage schedules and deadlines Monitor inventory of office supplies and the purchasing of new material with attention to budgetary constrains Organise and supervise other office activities Human Resources: Be the first point of contact for all HR-related queries Administer HR-related documentation, such as contracts of employment Ensure the relevant HR database is up to date, accurate and complies with legislation Plan, implements, and manages the human resources function, including recruiting, employee relations, regulatory compliances, benefits, staff developments, and employee communications Investigates employee relations issues such as disciplinary and grievances Effectively communicate HR policies, procedures, programs and laws organization wide Finance: Achieves financial objectives by anticipating requirements; submitting information for budget preparation; scheduling expenditures; monitoring costs; analysing variances. Monitor cost and expenses, maintenance activities and tradespersons Responsible for Capital & Expense budget Tracking budget expenses Manage day to day finances, make payments to vendors and service providers. Coordinate with outsourced accountancy service, in regards to payroll management, and other financial matters. Qualifications and Experience: Bachelors degree and a minimum of five years of related experience Strong working knowledge of and experience in Indian labour law and local regulations Proven experience as administration management, supervisory, budgeting skills Outstanding communication skills, both verbal and written Proven ability to establish priorities and meet deadlines Outstanding organizational skills; the ability to multi-task and make decisions under pressure In-depth understanding of office management procedures and departmental and legal policies Familiarity with financial and facilities management principles Proficient in MS Office An analytical mind with problem-solving skills A team player with leadership skills This is a challenging opportunity for a dedicated and highly motivated professional. If you would like to join this dynamic team, please send your CV to info@datamar.com.br Job Location Hennur, Bangalore Position Type: Full-Time/Regular (Monday Saturday) Salary: INR 400,000 - 500,000 Salary:INR 4,00,000 - 5,00,000 P.A Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: HR , Recruitment , Administration , IR Role Category:HR/ Recruitment / IR Role:HR Executive Keyskills Administration Management HR Policies Finance Control Recruitment Budgeting Skills Executive Support Employee Relations Foreign Trade Budget Preparation MS Office Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Company Profile: Datamar Business Intelligence Pvt Ltd Datamar India is a data and market intelligence provision company working in the maritime and foreign trade sector with a focus on the East Coast of South America. MSEL - Mobile Solutions for Engagement and Learning-  is a technology start up in Learning Content space. We are a part of incubation/start-up ecosystem of Mahindra Comviva (M&M Group). This is a comprehensive learning solution  launched in B2B space to begin with but later will be taken to D2C space as well. We are in a hyper expansion mode and are looking to find technology folks who can join us to lead the expansion. This is a great opportunity to be a part of this game-changing B2B Initiative. The Learning solution in question has patented feature. Responsibilities will also include building long term strategy to create and grow market for the solution, planning and implementing the activities towards achieving growth and profitability related targets. A few customers include airtel, Orange, MTN, Vodafone, Tigo, Econet Wireless, etc. The company is a subsidiary of Tech Mahindra and a part of the $16.9 billion Mahindra Group. project_414.description:
**Title:** SOW Coordinator- Scalene Works: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Job Description PRIMARY - Accountable to manage the end to end SOW process between Vendor and Client as being efficiently executed with the purpose of driving timely and accurate tracking which feeds Vendor payable - critical data collection SECONDARY - Provide administrative and client facing support as needed to address outstanding finance / billable issues that stem from SOW timing activities Activities: - Work closely with recruiters and onboarding teams to confirm contractors hired and eligible for specific onboarding and SOW submission - adhere to Client submission requirements and submit SOW request through Client system - track all submissions to ensure they are returned - manage resubmissions with Client directly for inaccuracies - Work with Vendors to ensure alignment of start dates on SOW to align with billing - Work with Vendor billing departments to ensure billing issue and SOW issues are effectively resolved - Work directly with Client SOW team to help in expediting SOW issues - Tracking down any necessary approvals for bill rates on SOW as necessary prior to submission - Manage all end date extensions and end dates - working closely with Account Admin on active headcount status - provide additional onboarding and contractor management support as needed - ensure deadline and timeframes are met - provide administrative support to A/R teams to help manage outstanding receivables with Client finance teams sitting offshore - Co-ordinate with onboarding and finance teams to manage new hires. Measures: - All new SOW submittals are sent in within 24 hours of start date. Skill Sets: - Comfortable working in excel with basic knowledge to move data around, fill in templates, create a basic table and fill in data. - Good customer service skills / ability to write emails to external clients to support the submission and retrieval of necessary paperwork. - Good phone skills needs to be able to handle themselves on the phone with clients, vendors and internal Vendor teams - basic knowledge of finance and accounting practices would be advantageous - familiar with operating practices - High attention to detail and accuracy - Ability to work independently. Shift : US Shift Male Candidates are preferred Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Recruitment / Staffing Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Other Role:Outside Consultant Keyskills Receivable Finance US Shift Customer Service Administrative Support Contract Management Data Collection Desired Candidate Profile   Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Confidential Confidential Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

We provide Course Development, Training and Managed Hosting to clients in Education, Corporate Training, Healthcare and Government in Australia and Canada. We are a young and dynamic organization that will put you in the driver seat and give you a chance to learn fast, and contribute to our growth and our brand. This job will require you to work from home and you will be required to work between the hours of 6:30:00 PM and 2:30 AM (IST). You will be supporting our Canadian clients so you will need to have a strong knowledge of Moodle and strong written and verbal communication skills. **Title:** Regional Business Manager ( Main Division): Job Description   Send me Jobs like this 1. Responsible to create & develop his own sales team of ABMs and TBOs (MRs) of high potential with the necessary technical expertise & knowledge. 2. Self-motivated to mentor & motivate his team to sell the company's product along with knowledge of business expansion in Bangalore. 3. Having well deserve reputation, experience and understanding about the procedure of establishing of strong distribution network. 4. Always ready to act/address as a point of first reference for all sales / field related queries and issues and work collaboratively with colleagues in field to accurately assess their problems & needs to resolve them on time. 5. He must be smart enough to generate business from his existing customers and from new customers to provide immediate stand to the new launched company. 6. Responsible for reviewing Sales data to ensure that the field force is kept up to date the progress of new developments regarding the company's objectives & competitors products. 7. Closely involved with the field force to assess the response in field after their daily working to ensure that company's corporate policies and marketing strategies must be followed & implemented in a timely manner. 8. Take regular feedback from teammates to assess customer attitudes to the current product range and new product introductions. 9. Assist to team from front to let them understand the importance of accomplishment of their annual Sales plan & Target for the organization. 10. Must have good General products knowledge for on job training to his team, when and where required to enhance their sales performance to achieve the company's objectives. **Title:** Inside Sales Specialist and lead Generation Specialist jobs: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Inside sales specialist and lead generation Specialist jobs in leading Company. For more info Call or whatsapp at 9611209386 This is an opportunity for you to use your incredible sales skills to move to the head of the pack. You will be working with small to medium size businesses in the U.S in a way that will lead to a closed sale. Your business acumen, research, ability to show Return on Investment and closing skills will win the day. Eligibility Graduates fresher/Experience Undergraduate with Inside sales or telesales Experience for one year Shifts and off : Day /US shift Work location : BTM/Yemulur Salary : up to 10 Lakh (depends upon relevant experience) Company Description Company is part of a leader in connected vehicle technologies, with solutions for fleet management, usage-based insurance and road usage charge programs in use throughout North America, South America, Europe and India. It is one of the fastest growing and most dynamic sales centers in all of Bangalore! Company is blowing away the competition with our leading edge solutions for fleet tracking, and our reps are making a great living doing it. Some of our team members are among the highest paid in Bangalore. What We Offer Be part of one of the best inside sales teams in Bangalore Highly dynamic sales environment where the Bangalore team is outselling the competition that uses inside sales groups in the US. Go India!! Best-in-industry sales compensation that includes not only lucrative fixed and variable components, but also spot bonuses and contests for trips, vacations, cash, and more Top sales reps are pulling in over 40 Lakhs per annum! Medical insurance - company paid Pick-up and drop off transportation to most locations in Bangalore - company paid All meals provided - company paid What we are looking for? We are looking for a talented and competitive Inside Sales Representative that thrives in a quick sales cycle environment. The successful candidate will play a fundamental role in achieving our ambitious customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. You must be comfortable making dozens of calls per day, working with channel partners, generating interest, qualifying prospects and closing sales. What do inside sales executives do? Inside sales are the sale of products or services by sales personnel who reach customers by phone or online, rather than traveling to meet them face-to-face. Inside relies on the phone, emails and the internet to reach customers Responsibilities Source new sales opportunities through inbound lead follow-up and outbound cold calls and emails Understand customer needs and requirements Route qualified opportunities to the appropriate sales executives for further development and closure Close sales and achieve quarterly quotas Research accounts, identify key players and generate interest Maintain and expand your database of prospects within your assigned territory Team with channel partners to build pipeline and close deals Perform effective online demos to prospects Career opportunities in Inside sales There are many reasons why people choose a career in sales. From unlimited income to the autonomy that many sales careers offer, sales careers certainly have a lot to offer. With the Inside Sales industry growing due to an increasing number of employers recognizing the many benefits of employing inside reps, choosing a career in Inside Sales have become a topic of consideration for many job hunters. If you are actively seeking a sales position and have been wondering if you should pursue an Inside Sales position, here are a few factors that may sway you towards considering moving inside. A Dynamic, High-Energy Work Atmosphere High Income and Awards Being able to work from anywhere in the world is not something that all those in the Inside Sales industry can enjoy but those that can often claim this factor as the most appealing thing about their positions. Required Skills Ability to engage and build long term relationship with prospects Clear and concise verbal communication skills appropriate to the U.S and U.K prospects Working knowledge of Salesforce.com and MS Office would be an added advantage Proven ability to identify and develop new sales opportunities. Knowledge of sales and marketing including basic selling principles and solution selling methods; should be able to discover prospects pain points by using probing techniques and effectively address each one of them. Ability to quickly research a prospect company and tailor your presentation to their specific needs and close the sale. **Title:** Development Consultant(telecom Billing): Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Role In a team or independently codes or configures software according to functional specifications. Unit tests and debugs thoroughly. Participates in code reviews, design reviews, or other forms of team quality procedures. Contributes to functional specification and detailed design documents. Communicates with clients to obtain straightforward information or answer simple inquiries.  May make simple design decisions, work delegation, and assign tickets to other team members. Resolves assigned trouble tickets. Regularly consult the senior members of the team and architects on issues. Assists in Release Management, Configuration Management, Build Management, Stream Management and Ticket Management as required. Mentors less experienced staff and consults with peers. Supports System Testing, Solution Integration Testing, User Acceptance Testing and provides timely resolutions to problems encountered. Operates as a full working member of the team, participating in reaching consensus and providing some guidance to junior level members. Adheres to companys software development standards and procedures. Skills Ability to optimize algorithms, develop and review code, debug and performance tune code, and document. Works well within a team environment. Skilled at interpreting client requirements. Knowledge of Software Development life Cycle. Experience working in a product implementation project. Should have handled delivery package creation, and release note documentation. Developed communication skills to understand and clarify moderately complex instructions. Developed skills to complete low level designs/high level designs. Technical Skill Candidates with Telecom Billing experience. Develop skills to complete low level designs from high level designs. Programming skills: experience working in any one of the languages such as: like EPM, C, C++, JAVA, etc. Perl experience will be an added advantage. Database skill: Oracle with working knowledge of SQL. OS: Unix or Linux. Tuxedo will be an added advantage. Other IT experience: 1 - 5 years Telecom Billing experience: 1+ years Education: BE/BTECH/MCA Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills singleview Singl.eview Single view singleview and intec single e view Telecom Billing Kenan Geneva Billing Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Company Profile: CSG International CSG International is the 2nd largest business support solutions (BSS) provider, CSG International provides solutions to a global client base. Join an elite team of IT professionals who are driven for success in finding innovative solutions for our company and clients. We respond to the complexity of a dynamic, convergent world with a flexible set of needs-based solutions, innovative new technologies and forward thinking that helps our clients solve business problems and identify new opportunities and revenue streams. Key Facts: Listed on NASDAQ: CSGS Year 2012 - Total Revenue $ 756.9 million 2nd largest BSS provider serving the worldwide communications industry More than 3,500 employees in 24 countries #1 in wholesale billing and mediation worldwide Ranked #1 in North American cable billing market 400+ clients in 24 countries Solutions support more than 48 million broadband subscribers in North America CSG sends more than 300 million interactive messages on behalf of our clients annually CSG handles more than 167 million transactions per day, or more than 4 billion per month, on behalf of our North American clients CSG's solutions touch more than half of all U.S. households For more information, visit our website at www.csgi.com Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

project_464.description:
**Title:** Director / Senior Director - Delivery: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Job Description The Global Delivery Director is responsible for managing all aspects of project delivery across the global delivery centres of iMEDGlobal and serves as an escalation point for local Resource Managers or Service delivery managers. This role is the primary point of accountability for service delivery performance including SLA attainment, continuous improvement and contract management. You will own P&L responsibility, billing, and all service delivery/customer satisfaction for our global program. As a member of the Account Leadership Team, this role is a key contributor to account level business strategy and is an evangelist for Atos services across the globe. SLA Compliance Assist the Transition team in establishing SLAs within the framework of the contract. SLA compliance and excellence in execution of services. Execute and deliver against the Statement of Work. New Scope Opportunity Management / Growth in Existing Engagements Identify new areas of potential revenue to grow the global program. Actively contribute to the development and execution of the Strategic Account Plan. Actively participate in the qualification and prioritization of opportunities. Manage the creation, review and presentation of proposals. Business Management P&L management to optimize margin and costs. Lead Quarterly Business Reviews with client and internal senior management. Ensure a true global model in place through collaboration with regions around the globe to adapt best practices and consistent approach throughout customers business. Management of continuous improvement plans to optimize margin and minimize variable expenses. Identify customer pain points and work to mitigate in a quick, concise manner. Partner with internal finance teams. Ensure compliance with appropriate contract Change Management practices. General Operations Management Maintain daily operation for customer and internal management. Point of contact for all Operations Managers globally. Responsible for team adherence to all Atos and applicable client practices. Responsible for financial tracking of all aspects of the engagement to ensure profitability. Responsible for change management for the contract and the Statement(s) of Work. Ensuring that the client is a positive reference. Salary:INR 35,00,000 - 40,00,000 P.A Industry: Pharma / Biotech / Clinical Research Functional Area: Medical , Healthcare , R&D , Pharmaceuticals , Biotechnology Role Category:R&D Role:Pharmacist/Chemist/Bio Chemist Keyskills Delivery Head Pharmacovigilance Director Senior Director Drug safety Delivery Lead Global Lead Desired Candidate Profile 15-20 years of people management experience in service delivery environment in life science/Healthcare or KPO industry. MD/MBBS or BDS or PhD in Lifesciences. Demonstrated leadership in customer facing senior management roles.Background in service delivery within a global matrix environment.Track record of successfully managing both projects and day-to-day operations.Strong experience managing, leading, and developing a global, customer-focused team.Strong problem solving, time management, project management and organizational skills.Able to establish critical customer relationships and all levels of client organization.Outstanding verbal and written communication skills, with experience presenting to senior executives.This position requires a positive attitude, open mind and a creative approach to problem solving.ITIL, PMP and/or Lean Six Sigma Certification a plus.Able to travel domestically and internationally up to 20%. Education- UG: MBBS - Medicine, BDS - Dentistry PG:Medical-MS/MD - Any Specialization Doctorate:Ph.D Company Profile: iMEDGlobal iMEDGlobal is an innovation driven company providing platforms, services and solutions to global life sciences clients addressing their critical business and scientific needs. Our platforms, services and solutions include Pharmacovigilance, Regulatory Affairs and Clinical Research. iMEDGlobal's corporate office is based out of Princeton, NJ and has offices in Philippines & India. Led by a strong management team, with decades of experience and thought leadership with leading pharmaceutical, biotech, medical devices, consumer healthcare and technology enterprises, iMEDGlobal is designed to deliver high quality and cost effective solutions and services for our clients in the Americas, Europe, Asia and Australia. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details
**Experience:** 20 years

**Must-Have Skills**

project_491.description:
**Title:** Urgent Opening-scientific Project Manager-fresher-kolkota/bangalore: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Greeting from R2R Consultants!!! We have excellent opportunity with an leading Health care Industry.. MD Pharmacology Freshers only Apply  Job Location- Kolkota/Bangalore Job Designation- Scientific project manager Job Description. Participate in set up, oversight and follow-up of assigned clinical studies/medical projects, ensuring that the studies are carried out in accordance with all relevant processes and procedures Assist relationships and advance the scientific credibility of the Company with established and emerging Regional/National Opinion Leaders (OL). Respond to requests for scientific/medical information and provide key scientific information updates to Regional and National OLs, as appropriate. Develop/maintain key scientific knowledge that enable credible dissemination of scientific information, informed scientific dialogue with physicians/OLs and development of professional working relationships Ensure compliance with all applicable national laws & regulations, guidelines, codes of conduct, Abbotts policies & procedures, and accepted standards of best practice PRIMARY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES - EXAMPLES KEY CUSTOMERS Provide scientific and technical support for, and help maintain professional and credible relationships with, key OLs/ academic centres to ensure access to current medical/scientific information on the products/areas of therapeutic interest. Assist in initiation, oversight and follow up of assigned clinical studies/medical projects initiated within the relevant TA (e.g. post marketing clinical activities such as registry/database projects, epidemiological surveys, post-authorization studies (phase IV), IIS projects, etc.). Note: all activities to comply with applicable local laws, guidelines, codes of practice, SOPs, and GPRD SOPs. Maintain contacts with physicians and OLs of the assigned geographic area in order to satisfy their needs for scientific knowledge in the therapeutic area and, where requested, Abbott drugs/products the SPM carries responsibility for. Deliver credible presentations on scientific matters to physicians, individually or in groups (meetings, clinical sessions, etc.), where requested. Internal Clinical Research Manager Clinical Operations Manager Medical Advisers/Managers Marketing department of the therapeutic area Sales organization of the geographic area of responsibility. Administrative personnel of the Medical Department and of the Business Unit. Pharmacovigilance Unit of the Affiliate. Medical Information Service. IMD/GPT/GSS/MBO Personnel Participate in the selection process to identify appropriately qualified physicians the Company would wish to engage in collaborative efforts such as potential research collaborations, or lecture/meeting support (Round Tables, Congresses, Symposia, etc.); and to ensure a high level of scientific or educational integrity in these collaborative efforts. Develop awareness and understanding of competitor issues/intelligence for example, product strategies, studies, commercial messages, positioning, etc and communicate, where appropriate, within the Company. External Healthcare personnel of the medical area in which the SPM performs his or her functions (physicians, nurses, pharmacists) Participating Research Investigators Opinion leaders Institutions and Scientific or Medical Societies Attend relevant Scientific Societies meetings/Conferences, and develop summaries of key messages for use within the Company such as key areas of scientific/company interest, new trends in diagnosis, monitoring & treatments in the TA, etc. AUTHORITY / REPORTING LINES LOCATION Upon request, assist physicians appropriately direct requests for access to Company products on a named patient or compassionate use basis, subject to all applicable legal and regulatory requirements Support sales/marketing/internal team areas to develop their scientific and technical expertise through the delivery of scientific update presentations. Provide KOLs & internal medical/clinical teams with scientific/technical support for publications of scientific/ medical interest. Ensure up to date knowledge of products uses and external data. Perform administrative duties in a timely manner as assigned. Reports to a Medical Manager (or equivalent) of an assigned Therapeutic Area Typically this function is field (remote to office) based REQUIRED CORE COMPETENCIES / ATTRIBUTES - EXAMPLES REQUIRED MEDICAL KNOWLEDGE AREAS Adaptability Maintains effectiveness when experiencing major changes in work tasks or the work environment; adjusts effectively to work within new work structures, processes, requirements, or cultures. Considers change or new situations as opportunities for learning and growth. Perseveres when encountering adversity. When confronted with a problem or crisis, considers alternatives and then takes timely action. Effectively prioritizes work tasks. Initiative Takes prompt action to accomplish objectives; is proactive. Maintains a strong focus on internal and/or external customers. Continuously monitors relevant information, key issues and/or trends. Proactively seeks feedback and adapts behavior to improve performance. Demonstrates a willingness to learn new aspects of the business. Solid knowledge of pharmaceutical industry Knowledge of the scientific methods applied to clinical research and the current legislative/regulatory controls. Keen interest in developing and maintaining expert knowledge for assigned therapeutic area/product and in medical research in general REQUIRED PERSONAL / TECHNICAL SKILLS Innovation Generates innovative solutions in work situations; tries different and novel ways to deal with work problems and opportunities. Uses best practice and benchmark data to increase organizational performance. Identifies opportunities to improve efficiencies and red uce costs. Integrity Firmly adheres to codes of conduct and ethical principles. Exhibits honesty. Presents information accurately and completely. Keeps commitments to work colleagues and customers. Acknowledges and responds constructively to failure and mistakes. Team work / collaboration Works effectively and cooperatively with others; establishes and maintains good working relationships with internal and external partners to facilitate the accomplishment of work goals. Helps others achieve shared goals. Demonstrates a willingness to listen without interrupting. Open to diverse and different ideas. High customer orientation Excellent skills to set stake-holders relationship, networking, tact and diplomacy Strong commitment to compliance with the relevant rules and procedures, and to scientific quality and integrity A good understanding of written English * Where these fall within area of responsibility Candidates from Pan India can apply Kindly revert me back with your update resume Email Id: recruiter3@r2rconsults.com Qualification - MD Pharmacology(Fresher) Regards, Nitya Nair R2R Consults Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Pharma / Biotech / Clinical Research Functional Area: Medical , Healthcare , R&D , Pharmaceuticals , Biotechnology Role Category:R&D Role:Clinical Research Associate/Scientist Keyskills MD Pharmacology Medical advisor Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate, MBBS - Medicine PG:Medical-MS/MD - Any Specialization, Pharmacology Company Profile: R2R Consultants Leading health Care Indusrtry R2R is driven by active partnerships with industry bodies and customers with unparalleled domain knowledge. R2R's Customised Approach in deploying these solutions supports clients with best fit solutions to match up to their requirements. Clients can expect to Stay Ahead in their businesses by partnering with R2R. **Title:** Global PLM System Architect: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Role Summary/Purpose Global PLM System Architect will own and manage PLM (Product Life-Cycle Management) IT Infrastructure for GE OG Windchill instances that includes hardware servers, Storage, Network in GE datacenters and 3rd party Cloud. In this role, you will be working very closely with GE GO-IT & GE OG CTO teams and various platform technology owners and solution architects. Essential Responsibilities In the role of Global PLM System Architect, you will: Own & drive Infrastructure architecture strategy, design and capacity planning for PLM platforms (e.g. Windchill) implementation across GE OG Define architecture and infrastructure designs for PLM implementation & integrations with upstream and downstream technologies and applications Lead PLM instances \ environment build activities in GE datacenters and external clouds, own end-to-end project delivery Proactively work with subject matter experts to design, implement and manage PLM technology stack Manage relationship with GE GOCT\ CTO teams for infrastructure delivery, escalations and issue management Participate in datacenter strategy / consolidation efforts; and lead from GE OG Engineering IT related projects Apply advanced technical knowledge / skills in developing architectural solutions where complexity, innovation and technical expertise are required Partner with leaders across Corporate IT to implement future technology strategy in compute solutions and PLM infrastructure to deliver cost, cycle time, and maintainability benefits Drive Server & Client virtualization strategy for PLM infrastructure Deliver quality improvements and root-cause analysis to achieve high performance and high available PLM infrastructure Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Oil and Gas / Energy / Power / Infrastructure Functional Area: IT Software - Network Administration , Security Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Technical Architect Keyskills Design Networking Data Center IT Infrastructure Project Delivery Capacity Planning PLM System Architect Desired Candidate Profile Qualifications/Requirements Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Computer Science from an accredited college or universityMinimum 10 years of experience in PLM infrastructureAdditional Eligibility Qualifications GE will only employ those who are legally authorized to work in the United States for this opening. Any offer of employment is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background investigation and drug screen.Desired Characteristics Strong analytical and problem solving skills - communicates in a clear and succinct manner and effectively evaluates information/data to make decisions; anticipates obstacles and develops plans to resolve; creates actionable strategies and operational plansSubject Matter Expert in IT infrastructure & technologies; understand hardware technology stackExperienced in leading & managing Enterprise-wide implementation PLM (e.g Windchill) infrastructure in one or more OEMExperience in industrial businesses, the energy sector and highly distributed matrix organizationsDemonstrated competency in strategic thinking and leadership with strong relationship management abilityStrong communication, negotiating and influencing skills at all levels of the organization as well as with external partnersPLEASE NOTE: Houston, Texas is the preferred location, however other locations may be considered.GE works on things that matter. The team is part of the Global Engineering team of the Infrastructure businesses like Aviation, Energy, Oil & Gas and Water technologies, engaged in high-end design and analysis of Aircraft Engine components, Steam / Gas / Wind Turbines and Generators and mechanical drives for oil & gas applications. **Title:** Solutions Architect - Identity & Access Management: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Summary The Solutions Architect is responsible for designing and building features and systems that improve our security and awareness, as well as training and educating development staff on best practices. The Security Architect should be hands on and have enough development background to participate in design and development when necessary. Duties and responsibilities Design Identity and Access Management solutions  Define technical architecture and process solutions that when combined together meet the security risk profile of the company for confidentiality and integrity of IT Resources. Provide consulting services for IT risk and security expertise to assist business units to meet their business requirements  Assist IT Operations and Application Development with the implementation of information security best practices Deeply understand and implement security protocols and standards according to best practices. Assess potential items of risk and opportunities for vulnerabilities in the application and infrastructure In-depth knowledge and understanding of systems infrastructure, maintaining system integrity in accordance with the security policy of the organization. Configures software and other components to align them with specific organizational needs.  Participate in information security audits (i.e., Customer Audits: finance source, Company Member, internal, SOC I, SOC II & GLBA) to proactively minimize and eliminate information security vulnerabilities. Act as liaison between Security and IT teams to enable efficiency and coordination in communication and responses to Customer Audits. Respond to information security incidents and assist with internal and coordination in communication and responses to investigations. Maintain safety, security, and privacy standards throughout all areas of responsibility. Simeio IIC is the first and only solution of its kind designed specifically to operate, monitor and defend complex, multi-vendor IAM infrastructures and deliver actionable business intelligence. project_598.description:
**Title:** Talent Acquisition Sourcer: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Experience - 3+ Years Designation - Talent Acquisition Sourcer Job Location - Bangalore Notice Period - 15 Days We are looking for an experienced Sourcer/Recruiter to join our Global Strategic Sourcing team. The Global Strategic Sourcing team works in partnership with the Recruiting teams to provide proactive and predictive recruiting services for HPE with a focus on developing pipelines of qualified talent and sourcing candidates with niche skill sets. Your role will be to proactively target and headhunt passive talent, for profiles which are not easily filled with traditional recruiting methods, and build talent pools of qualified candidates ready to be hired. Key responsibilities of the Sourcer include: * Providing specialized sourcing expertise for technical and niche profiles. This includes designing creative and innovative ways of finding passive external talent for HPE * Building and maintaining talent pools of suitably qualified candidates based on business demands * Consulting with hiring managers and recruiters to develop a strategic sourcing plan and ensure successful recruitment of quality candidates * Direct and proactive outreach to passive talent, including cold calling and headhunting * Fully qualifying the candidate during an initial telephone interview * Proactively using e-recruitment tools and Social Media to source top qualified candidates and keep up-to-date with new trends in sourcing * Staying present in the process and engaged with the candidate thought out the full recruitment lifecycle * Developing and maintaining effective networks to maximize visibility and attract top quality candidates. * Contributing to HPE's diversity objectives by developing a diverse top qualified pool of candidates (as applicable by geography) Support will be provided by the current team in order to build your knowledge of the organisation, systems and recruitment channels. Qualifications: E xperience * Substantial experience in a recruitment agency environment where you have been involved in directly sourcing, headhunting, cold calling and interviewing candidates * Demonstrated experience of managing hiring manager and stakeholder expectations * Experience of recruiting experienced IT professionals * First-level university degree or equivalent preferred * Experience of using social networking tools for recruitment e.g. LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter * Proven track record of delivering sufficient, high-quality pipelines for multiple complex searches simultaneously Skills & Competencies * Strong knowledge of recruitment and external market trends across India * Motivated team player with a passion for recruitment * Proficient at time management and organization with a strong sense of urgency, flexibility, and adaptability * Ability to effectively sell the HPE value proposition to candidates * Superior communication (written/verbal), presentation, and facilitation skills, with the ability to communicate effectively across all employee groups and levels (executives, managers & employees) * Persuasive and effective email and phone communication skills * Able to deal with ambiguity and changing landscapes * Creative mindset, able to think outside the box * Autonomous strategic thinker and change driver - makes things happen * Expert analytical & problem-solving skills * Ability to work in a collaborative manner and develop strong working relationships with clients, employees and HR colleagues. **Title:** Database Administrator: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Job Description The Database Administrator is responsible for effective installation, upgrade,patching, database infrastructure. Tech Mahindra is part of the US $15.4 billion Mahindra Group and is a leading global systems integrator and business transformation consulting organization, focused primarily on the telecommunications industry. Tech Mahindra helps companies innovate and transform by leveraging its unique insights, differentiated services and flexible partnering models. This has helped customers reduce operating costs, generate new revenue streams and gain competitive advantage. Tech Mahindra expanded its IT portfolio in 2009 by acquiring the leading global business and information technology services company, Mahindra Satyam (earlier known as Satyam Computer Services). Tech Mahindra's capabilities spread across a broad spectrum, including Business Support Systems (BSS), Operations Support Systems (OSS), Network Design & Engineering, Next Generation Networks, Mobility Solutions, Security consulting and Testing. The company has been involved in about 8 transformation programs of incumbent telecom operators. Candidate Profile: Candidate should be an existing team leader for at least 1 year. Should have exhaustive experience in driving customer satisfaction related deliverables Experience in telecom industry preferable. Current team size should be minimum 15 associates. Ability to guide individuals toward goal achievement using negotiation, teamwork / collaboration, motivation and staff development skills including the ability to act as a role model within the organization. Ability to demonstrate innovation and good judgment / problem solving skills when making decisions. Ability to establish a course of action for self and others to accomplish a specific goal while using appropriate resources. Ability to coach, develops action plans, which maximize performance and provide effective feedback. Proven ability to analyze and improve work processes and policies Excellent customer service / support skills, ability to work well under pressure, professional demeanor and strong written and oral communication skills. Must have proficiency with various software applications programs including Lotus Notes, Microsoft Word, and Excel. Interacting with clients through e-mails and daily Conference Calls to review and resolve operational issues as well as implementing new process & procedure changes. Conceiving/implementing short/long-term business plans for achievement of organizational financial objectives. THE POSITION WOULD BE BASED IN MUMBAI / BANGALORE / GURGAON AND THE SALARY WOULD BE THE BEST IN THE INDUSTRY. **Title:** Charted Accountant-salarpuria Sattva: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Greetings from Salarpuria Sattva Group ! About Salarpuria Sattva: Founded in 1986 with the primary focus of developing high quality constructions, the Group has attained leadership positioning in the field and is one of the most preferred brands in the country today. Having pioneered the early development landscape in Bangalore and literally shaping the city's skyline since the mid-80s, the Group has a diverse portfolio of world-class IT Parks, commercial, residential, hospitality and retail properties. The Salarpuria Sattva Group is one among the leading names in the construction Industry today. We are recognized as one of the most "trusted" builders in India. Technically sound across various areas of finance including taxation and Cos. Act compliance. Fund raise (incl. debt) exposure , statutory branch audits & internal audits. Tax audits, filing of returns, department correspondence and assessment proceedings. Maintenance of books of accounts in computerized environment, Preparation of Final accounts as per accounting standards. Communicated audit results to upper management through written reports and oral presentations. Responsible for end to end Accounts & finance Process. project_732.description:
**Title:** Job Opening for Undergraduate Freshers in BPO Voice Process: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Are you an undergraduate looking for job and couldnt get anywhere and looking for ways to start your career, why dont you try in BPO? Shift and off: UK shift/Night shift; 2 way cabs available Job location: Ecospace, belandur/Bommanahalli/Brookfield Type : International voice process/Domestic voice process Salary: 2.5 LPA-4 LPA Why to start career in BPO? BPO has always been a career choice which gives you an opportunity to grow and develop your personality and communication skills. The recent survey also tells the fast growth of this industry Your skills to become globally competitive. BPO is the most stable and fast growing industry nowadays despite the global economic crisis. Great career opportunities await qualified individuals who will join the industry. Working in a call center will also help you develop your communication skills Your grade of pay in voice processing industry: Your salary would depend on the company at which you are working. Salaries also depend of the nature of call centers and shifts. As a fresher you can start from 10000/- or more and when you become managers then you draw more than 30,000/- per month. After this you also get perks and other benefits as well. Requisites Education is not a matter of concern if you have excellent fluency in English Flexible to work in shifts Willing to work in voice process Job roles and responsibilities: Voice Process: As it suggests, you need to talk to customers and get things done. Voice jobs pay more compared to non voice. The main activity in a call center is to handle the customers queries effectively and satisfactory. Also to co-ordinate well in a team in order to offer the best service possible to the customer. Career opportunity in Voice processing can be best describes as the ways in which customers can get their complaints and grievances answered and fixed with the help of the voice processors. It is a technical term that needs some kind of an interaction between the callers and the called. They have been given many terms as well. You can also be known as a customer support and many such names just to mention a few. There are other job profiles as well in the same stream. It depends on the agency for which you are working and the type of job which you have grabbed. Career prospects of a voice processor: It has been see that the ones who would want to go for a career in this line never fail. You have ample options and companies to join. There are different sections of a call center where you can work and earn money. You can also start your own call center when you are well experienced. Never forget to have a taste of each and every section in a voice processing industry so that you can get into any section whenever you would want. There are no scarcities of job in this sector. You can also set up other establishments or work somewhere during the daytime and work at call centers as a part time employee at night. If you are interested get back to me by sending your CV to shwetha.ca@ikyaglobal.com or call @+91-9611209386 and fix up your interview Interviews are happening on daily basis until position gets filled! Duties and Responsibilities: Scope: PRIMARY - Accountable to manage the end to end SOW process between Vendor and Client as being efficiently executed with the purpose of driving timely and accurate tracking which feeds Vendor payable - critical data collection SECONDARY - Provide administrative and client facing support as needed to address outstanding finance / billable issues that stem from SOW timing activities Activities: - Work closely with recruiters and onboarding teams to confirm contractors hired and eligible for specific onboarding and SOW submission - adhere to Client submission requirements and submit SOW request through Client system - track all submissions to ensure they are returned - manage resubmissions with Client directly for inaccuracies - Work with Vendors to ensure alignment of start dates on SOW to align with billing - Work with Vendor billing departments to ensure billing issue and SOW issues are effectively resolved - Work directly with Client SOW team to help in expediting SOW issues - Tracking down any necessary approvals for bill rates on SOW as necessary prior to submission - Manage all end date extensions and end dates - working closely with Account Admin on active headcount status - provide additional onboarding and contractor management support as needed - ensure deadline and timeframes are met - provide administrative support to A/R teams to help manage outstanding receivables with Client finance teams sitting offshore - Co-ordinate with onboarding and finance teams to manage new hires. Measures: - All new SOW submittals are sent in within 24 hours of start date. project_755.description:
**Title:** R&D Engineer - Core Java Devlopers | Ipsoft - Bangalore: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Job Title : R&D Engineer Department : Research and Development Education : Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent Location : Bangalore (ITPL, Whitefield) Overview: In the R&D world, speed and quality are sometimes two competing factors. On the one hand, there is the sprint to delivery and on the other hand, there is the standard of excellence. Our Developers balance the need for speed and functionality with their commitment to quality. We seek R&D engineers who can shape the future of infrastructure management. Responsibilities: We are looking for hands-on developers ready to work with scientists tackling the big challenges in deep language understanding. With an extensive existing customer base and a market-leading position in help desk automation, your work will go into production as soon as it shows measurable improvement over current methods. We think long term, while putting our research into practice on a rational schedule. You are passionate about good code and know how to make it a reality - how to fight for quality and sprint to delivery, managing the need for speed and functionality and the commitment to quality. You know how to use the latest tools and frameworks, not just because they're new, but because they help get the job done. You know how to lead and mention junior engineers and follow and deliver results for managers on predictable schedules. Work with other members of R&D, Systems, Applications, and Networking to design and build infrastructure management systems. Write clean, scalable, documented code and unit tests. To work on SQL/MYsql is a must. Continuously research new technologies, frameworks, and libraries. "Own" applications, features, and any associated bugs or performance problems. project_756.description:
**Title:** ETL Developer: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Role: The Analyst, as part of NHs Business Analytics team, will play a key role in shaping and strengthening NHs competitive edge. The Analyst will mine data from various sources, help design analyses, model the data to deliver meaningful and impactful insights. Job Responsibilities Develop and continuously refine comprehensive models and help construct dashboards and reports for various verticals.Identify and integrate various data sources and data points required to populate the models. Identify data gaps and drive clean-up and sanitation of data gaps.Help design visuals to effectively represent the data models and analyses to provide a clear structure for decision making. Understanding of data analysis and presentation concepts that facilitate collaborative work with BI engineer, Data Architect, Application developers and end users. Develop and deploy ETL job workflow with reliable error/exception handling and rollback Framework using SSIS Design, development and support of ETL components using SSIS and other ETL tools, which will be used to move data from source data and software application data stores into the optimized operational databases and Data Warehouse Design & develop SQL queries and reports to validate target data against source data Provide operational support and maintenance of data integrity between data sources and data warehouse Tuning the ETL processes, creation of the technical and system specification documents necessary to support ETL processes. Participate in development and execution of unit and system test plans Adapt ETL code to accommodate changes in source data and new business requirements. Document the ETL detailed design and test results. Prioritize development and enhancement requests. Manages automation of file processing as well as all ETL processes within a job workflow. Ensures data quality throughout entire ETL process. Ensures compliance with regulatory requirements for data transmission, business rules, storage, and data access including documentation, testing, and remediation. Collaborates with subject matter experts, department Leaders and database architect to define and execute cross-functional data movements for all aspects of data warehouse Create, maintain and optimize stored procedures, database and ETL processes Work with all levels of development from analysis through implementation and support. Interact with report owners to establish/clarify their requirements and develop report specifications. Develop Dashboard using Power BI. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: KPO / Research / Analytics Functional Area: Analytics & Business Intelligence Role Category:Analytics & BI Role:Data Analyst Keyskills SQL Predictive Modeling Business Analytics Data Analysis Reporting Software Development Computer Science Problem Solving Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Company Profile: Narayana Hrudayalaya Health City Narayana Health, one of India's largest and World's most economical healthcare service providers is set to emerge as a global industry model for its ability to reconcile quality, affordability, scale, transparency, credibility and sustainable profitability. From 300 beds hospital in 2001, Narayana Health has grown to a 6900 beds healthcare conglomerate in 2014 with 26 hospitals present in 16 Cities within the country and also has International Presence in Cayman. NH has been known for its cost- cutting approach and ranked 36th among World's 50 Most Innovative Companies by Fast Companies in 2012. NH has also been a proud recipient of Frost & Sullivan India Healthcare Excellence Awards 2012 in the category Healthcare Service Provider Company of the Year and FICCI Health Care Excellence Award 2012 for Addressing Industry Issues. **Title:** Senior Code Vulnerability Engineer: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this We have an urgent requirement for the post of Sr. Code Vulnerability Engineer with one of our client in Bangalore Position:Sr. Code Vulnerability Engineer. Mode : Permanent Exp : 8+yrs Location:Bangalore NP : Max 30Days General Description and Responsibilities Senior Code Vulnerability Engineer will play a critical role in code security and secure software development life cycle. It will encompass a broad range of information security controls to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of enterprise data stored on a variety of vendor database solutions. The job is composed of tactical, operational and strategic functions and responsibilities. Responsibilities Include: Conducted static and dynamic analysis on a variety of code bases and platforms. Conduct Information Security assessments / penetration tests, as an individual, self-managed tester, or in small project teams. Discover security vulnerabilities in web and mobile applications and provide recommended remediation steps to developers. Apply industry best practices for vulnerability and threat management. Document findings for management and technical staff and recommend mitigating actions. Work with internal customers to determine their need for security assessments, present and explain the employed methodology, and support them with feedback and verification during mitigation. Develop training on secure coding techniques and security awareness for technical staff (e.g., software developers). Position Requirements Bachelors Degree in Information Technology, Cyber Security, Computer Security, Computer Science or related field required. 8 years of development experience in mobile or web Ability to maintain composure in a dynamic environment Strong knowledge of Objective C Strong understanding of Java, C#, PHP, .Net, C Experience with, IBM AppScan, HP Fortify, Checkmarx and Veracode Experience with implementing security in the Agile development SDLC Individual must be proactive, self-motivated, detail-oriented, creative, inquisitive and persistent Strong leadership skills, including ability to execute and prioritize a number of tasks simultaneously Ability to organize, plan and implement work assignments, prioritize competing demands and work under pressure of frequent and tight deadlines Ability to approach problems systematically, researching all alternatives and making appropriate recommendations Excellent presentation, verbal and written communication skills Understanding of current attack methods, penetration testing methods, and hacking tools, specifically for web and mobile applications Strong hands-on and can-do attitude, excellent interpersonal and intercultural skills, ability to work in teams of technical and non-technical experts Ability to work methodically and independently and prioritize work Other duties as assigned. Desired Qualifications: Experience in Python a plus Major Certifications (such as GSSP-JAVA, GSSP-.Net, GWEB, GMOB, GWAPT, OSWE) Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Recruitment / Staffing Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Admin/Maintenance/Security/Datawarehousing Role:System Administrator Keyskills Objective C Java .Net PHP C# Python Web Technologies Agile Development Database Mobile Applications Desired Candidate Profile   Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Bob Technologies Bob Technologies Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

**Title:** Senior Project Manager (non-technical): Job Description   Send me Jobs like this About the department Operational Excellence (OpEx) being a part of GSC Support is a combination of cLEAN & Automation. cLEAN is the amalgamation of 2 most effective methodologies Lean and Six Sigma which is used to drive continuous improvement in GSC to reduce cost, creates efficiency, improves productivity and reduces errors. The ambition of Opex team in GSC is to Drive cLEAN competency development, Ensure Business impact from cLEAN & automation project execution and Implement cLEAN mind set. To drive this ambition cLEAN team identifies opportunities, drives, trains & mentors Lean Six Sigma projects & also provide consulting services to operation teams. The position Key responsibilities: Lead transition projects required to transition work into GSC Bangalore. Drive projects in GSC on budget, scope, and within timeline. Support Director cLEAN Business Support & Operational Excellence in implementing relevant management tools and business improvement ideas. Main job tasks: Lead transition projects required to transition work into GSC Bangalore Responsible for leading, facilitating and coordinating all transition activities from various SVP areas required to transition work into GSC.  Prepare the project plan, track project milestones and own end to end responsibility for the projects  Conduct various phases of transition: Pre-Transition, Transition Phase & Post-Transition Phase Scheduling & Planning Project requirements. Assist the sending organization in identifying the potential work that can be transitioned to GSC Bangalore Interaction with key stakeholders such as VPs / SVPs / Managers who are part of the steering committee for work transition project Develop the customized transition plan as per the requirement and drive it end to end Responsible for change management throughout the transition Risk management throughout the transition project Status update and interaction with key stakeholders in the respective LoB from time to time Propose changes periodically based on the experience and status of the transition project Responsible for framing the right governance structure related to the transition project Drive projects in GSC  Drive projects in Global Service Centre (GSC) Bangalore e.g. strategy setting, GSCMan workshops, establishment of Support GSC functions, process optimisation in GSC Bangalore (Support GSC or functional areas), organisational changes, facility expansion, IT system development and roll-out etc.. Support Director cLEAN Business Support & Operational Excellence in implementing relevant management tools and business improvement ideas Contribute to the development of GSC by assessing potential new functional areas in GSC, project opportunities in GSC Bangalore, performing internal/external benchmarking, support the GSC management meetings through preparing the presentation, driving the agenda, manage the minutes / follow-ups while working with PM-GSC Ongoing support to Director cLEAN Business Support & Operational Excellence with ad hoc analyses e.g. budget reports, business cases, GSC effectiveness, leave and absence analyses, various benchmarks etc. Assist in building relevant presentations, fact packs, external meeting preparations, arranging field visits etc Assist in setting up GSC Projects team Qualifications Education: Master Degree (preferably within business, economics or engineering) with results in top 10% or other relevant business experience e.g. from management consultancy. Experience: Proven project management experience Manage entire project, including structure and plan own work, meet all commitments, deal with issues, and actively drive project decision making Independently ensure senior/expert involvement when necessary Drive project problem solving, including defining and clarifying problems, structuring and prioritising issues, identifying analyses and approach, and developing recommendations Manage and take full ownership of end products, including follow-up and manage time, budget and quality Frequently communicate project progress to PM-GSC, project sponsor/owner, steering committee, and/or other appointed persons Identify and handle all relevant stakeholders within project/own area of work Understand and use proper communication methods and techniques in relation to project Knowledge application Pro-actively work to develop relevant knowledge such as models, frameworks, templates required by the transition and other projects Leverage project support and guidance from other relevant NN areas and external sources in all parts of project Apply core concepts and best practices and reach out to peers and/or superior for additional insights when appropriate Pro-actively solve project team conflicts, resource needs and requests. Personal skills: Strong leadership and interpersonal skills Drive and motivate project team members and other stakeholders Coach project members, pro-actively ensure feedback (both upwards and downwards), and take action to improve own and team performance, including pro-actively identifying relevant courses and training possibilities Push team and stakeholders if necessary, to achieve results, demonstrate drive, initiative, and a can-do mentality towards project tasks Strong English communication skills, both written and oral Proficient in the use of PC tools (Microsoft Office etc.) High degree of flexibility, and can shoulder additional workload when necessary Project related resource planning and reporting Working at Novo Nordisk At Novo Nordisk, we create value by putting patients first. Every ten seconds two people are diagnosed with diabetes, and more than 371 million people worldwide need us. Working here is not just a way to make a living, but a way to make a difference. Salary:INR 9,00,000 - 18,00,000 P.A Industry: Pharma / Biotech / Clinical Research Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Operations Role:Transitions/Migrations Manager Keyskills Project Management Project Execution Lean Six Sigma Project Planning Operational Excellence SCOPE Resource Planning Transition Scheduling Change Management Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate PG:Any Postgraduate Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Novo Nordisk Centre (India) Pvt Ltd Novo Nordisk Service Centre India Private Ltd (NNSCIPL) or Global Service Centre (GSC) located in Bangalore is an affiliate of Novo Nordisk A/S Denmark and was established to be the off-shoring hub for Novo Nordisk globally. project_814.description:
**Title:** Head - Program Management: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this The role will be responsible to manage project activities, schedules, resourcing, costs, and technical solutions to achieve customer and companies outcomes. - Obtaining business requirements, compile project plans and manage plans from start to finish. - Collaborating with project stakeholders to clearly define project objectives including functionality, timelines, business case and resource requirements. - Creating strategies for risk mitigation and contingency planning. - Maintaining timelines and develop launch / release plans for projects. **Title:** Manager Smart Controls: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this THE ROLE: We are currently seeking an experienced professional at a Manager level within IT Advisory (ITAS) for our KPMG Risk Consulting practice to join us in our Bangalore office. A Manager would typically be responsible for delivering specific IT Internal Audit and IT Risk assessment work, managing teams and managing quality of work. It includes establishing themselves as a subject matter expert in one or more chosen field of expertise, and delivering high quality work. Responsibilities: Responsible as team lead for performing a comprehensive program of compliance monitoring services in IT SOx 404 Audits, IT Internal Audit, business process/application controls testing and PCI DSS (payment certifications) in Financial Services Responsible for delivery and management of all testing of ITGCCs and application/business controls as it relates to SOX controls testing lifecycle. Responsible for seeing that all activities are performed in accordance with the agreed delivery timeline of controls testing and any escalations are properly communicated. Support in annual and quarterly plan for controls testing and communication of dependencies to the client. Coordinate with client for on-going observations, escalations to ensure minimum impact to actual delivery and all to ensure risks to delivery are communicated properly. Perform special assignments of a complex and/or sensitive nature as directed by the Quality lead and/or Operations lead as requested by client when necessary. Perform 100% detailed review of all steps of testing by team members and documentation to ensure minimum quality rejects. Perform a continuous quality improvement exercise to implement lessons learned of previous quarter rejects to make sure no repeats. Lead client walkthrough calls independently, demonstrating understanding of client's IT environment. Manage team of professionals in delivering Technology Risk engagements catering to Financial Services Develop people through effectively supervising, coaching, and mentoring all levels of staff Conduct performance reviews and contribute to performance feedback for all levels of staff Support leadership in maintaining an educational program to continually develop personal skills Understand, follow and communicate workplace policies and procedures to all levels of staff INDIVIDUAL: Successful candidates will display a combination of the following: Strong understanding of IT Sox, IT Internal Audit, data analytics, business process/application controls testing and Financial Services Industry certificate expertise, for example - CHAPS, MPS, LINK, etc. Demonstrating a detailed understanding of how current and emerging legal, regulatory, governance, IT SOx auditing and IT security standards that affect the clients Proven experience of successfully delivering high volume work to financial services industry clients. Ability to identify and assess complex IT risks and controls, Application controls and risks to relate them to the wider business environment and to express opinions clearly. Displays excellent Project and Client management skills to deliver high quality work on time and to budget Articulates the importance of delivering high quality work and risk management to the team Clearly articulates the expectation regarding work results, time effort and timelines to team members Encourages and motivates team members to achieve targets Seeks to understand people's motivations Prior experience in managing long term engagements would be preferred Manages the expectations of people regarding career development and progression Proactively addresses underperformance in both individuals and teams Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Accounting / Finance Functional Area: IT Software - Network Administration , Security Role Category:Admin/Maintenance/Security/Datawarehousing Role:IT/Networking-Manager Keyskills Team Management Auditing Planning SOX Client Management Team Leading IT Risk Risk Assessment Risk Management Quality Improvement IT Sox IT Internal Audit Data analytics IT SOx auditing Desired Candidate Profile   Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: KPMG KPMG Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

**Title:** Technology Consultant: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Responsible for implementing part or all of the technical solution to the client, in accordance with an agreed technical design. Occasionally responsible for providing a detailed technical design for enterprise solutions. Understands a broad spectrum of company technology in order to provide part or all of a detailed technical design which meets customer requirements. Often leads small to medium technical projects. Works with and under the direction of the Project/Technical Manager and with customer nominated representatives. Liaises with Solutions Architect as appropriate. Provides technical support and input on the application of technology to a defined business segment. Provides advice on solution and integration opportunities to defined segments. Provides technical leadership on specific integration activities that are part of an engagement. Provides planning and design support for the development of solution architectures that will be implemented in a multiple system environment. Communicates across client community, and is viewed as adding value. Demonstrates execution of the company strategy. Contributes to knowledge tools and communities, and ensures project learnings are documented and shared. Role models Focuses on single customer. Solves diverse and complex. May lead a project team. **Title:** Process jobs in Leading Company for IT help Desk/technical Support: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this IT help desk/Technical support/Service desk in leading company Are you looking to make your career in Technical support or IT help desk /service desk in leading company? Freshers also can apply! Importance of Technical support/IT help desk The information technology world has created exciting opportunities for anyone seeking a job in the technical world. Of those many jobs, the technical support position offers several advantages. Technical support personnel are typically among the brightest technical professionals , and must be ready to support other technology people, such as programmers, operators and hardware engineers. Technical support skills are totally portable from one company to another. A technical support specialist can take her knowledge with her to a new job and never miss a beat. Job location: Bangalore Salary: 2.5LPA-6 LPA (Depends upon relevant experience and education qualification) Shifts: Day shift/UK/US/ Australian/rotational shifts Cabs provided: 2 way Type : International voice process/Domestic voice process Eligibility: Graduate (Fresher/experienced) Under Graduate(Fresher/experienced) Type: International voice process/Domestic voice process Job summary Technical support and IT help desk executive will apply technical knowledge executive will apply technical knowledge related to computer hardware, software or network problem and providing resolution to end-users by performing a question diagnosis. What does an IT technical support officer do? As an IT help desk, you will be part of the IT crowd so you will be monitoring and maintaining the computer systems as well as the networks within an organization. You will be the first person employees will come to. Career progression and opportunities why career in technical support? Technical support is vital to the ongoing operational efficiency of the company. Supporting the rest of the business with their ongoing IT requirements, the sky is the limit. Being promoted to a more senior technical support role and from there to a team, section or department leader. Technical support can provide useful experience for other jobs Entry requirements One who insist to make career in technical field The computing world evolves very quickly and new technologies are always being developed so it is more important that candidates keep IT knowledge up to date. Typical work activities IT technical support officers are mainly responsible for the smooth running of computer systems and ensuring users get maximum benefits from them. Installing and configuring computer hardware operating systems and applications; Talking staff or clients through a series of actions over the telephone to help set up systems or resolve issues Testing and evaluating new technology; Stay current with system information, changes and updates Diagnose and resolve technical hardware and software issues involving internet connectivity, email clients, IPTV, VOIP and more; Skills and knowledge Knowledge of customer service principles and practices; Effective listening skills; Multi-tasking capabilities; Problem Solving, Verbal Communication, telephone etiquettes, Customer Service, PC Proficiency Competencies Possesses, acquires, and maintains the technical/professional expertise required to do the job effectively and to create effective customer solutions Sets high standards of performance for self; Assuming responsibility and accountability for successfully completing assignments or tasks; Self-imposing standards of excellence rather than having standards imposed.
