**Title:** Chief Financial Officer: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Key Tasks & Responsibilities: - Establish a business plan to reflect the strategic plan of ScaleneWorks - Develop performance measures to measure and improve the company's performance - Develop and implement financial and tax strategies - Develop, implement, maintain a capital request system - Prepare cash forecasts and monitor cash balances with corrective action as necessary - Arrange for equity and debt financing, finding the most efficient and cost effective way. - Establish, implement, and monitor financial management systems - Prepare management accounts pack on a monthly basis - Provide Financial Control over the operations of the Company - Manage the budget preparation process, provide advice and support to stakeholders - Manage the Finalization of accounts and preparation of the Balance Sheet - Review and manage the finalization of Quarterly and Annual financial statements Job / Person Specification: - Analyze results, report variances and reasons and provide recommendations and advice to address significant variances - Monitor the operation of accounting systems, controls and procedures in order to ensure the integrity of the financial information - Ensure statutory compliance, timely submission of Excise, Service Tax, and Sales Tax Returns etc. - Prepare for changes in legislation and implement any changes necessary. - Oversee with Tax Advisors for Completion of Assessment under various statues - Provide financial management support to internal stake holders - Ensure the effective, efficient, economical and transparent use of financial and other resources - Maintain banking relationships and represent the company. - Manage the investments and investments funds . - Company Secretarial duties as per law and regulations - Establish, implement and maintain finance structure Performance Standards - Ensure the organisation complies with all legal requirements - Ensure timely filing of returns under Income Tax, Excise, Service Tax and Sales Tax etc. - Ensure availability of Working Capital based on efficient use of the same - Ensure timely and accurate submission of Financial MIS to the Management - Keep the organisation and the family members abreast of developments Other Duties - Work on Projects and continuous improvement as and when required - Any other duties that may be requested by the management from time to time Core Competencies: Qualifications, Experience, Skills: - Chartered Accountant with at least 12-18 Years Experience - Good knowledge of Finance, Accounting and Laws relating to Income Tax, Excise, Service Tax and Sales Tax - Good knowledge of Companies Act and related obligations - Good communication and interpersonal skills for providing leadership to the department and the group. - Experience with company secretarial practices This job opening was posted long time back. It may not be active. Nor was it removed by the recruiter. Please use your discretion Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Banking / Financial Services / Broking Functional Area: Top Management Role:Head/VP/GM-CFO/Financial Controller Keyskills Management Accounting Finance Taxation Budgeting Company Secretarial Strategic Planning MIS Companies Act Business Planning Financial Management Desired Candidate Profile   Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Company Profile: Confidential Confidential Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

You will influence and contribute to the automation of Jivoxs software on cloud optimized for handling several billions of ad impressions. You will design and implement large scale public cloud architectures for smoother and faster software delivery. You will design and manage deployments of horizontal scaling systems, monitoring systems, big data systems, and a complete gamut of large scale distributed platform capabilities Jivox is adding to support dozens of billion events. **Title:** Academic Faculty: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Charaka Center for Education, Bangalore Experience: Teaching experience in tutorials is highly desirable Location: Bangalore Job Type: Two full time, Seven Visiting Faculty Salary: Highly competitive salary and benefits. A Bangalore based Medical Education Center, is recruiting faculty to teach two tutorial courses. One in Post Graduate Medical Entrance Examinations (AIPGMEE) and another in MCI Screening Tests for Foreign Medical Graduates. Two full time and seven visiting faculty positions are available. Duties are to resume by first quarter of next year. Applicant must be medically qualified. Experience in teaching post graduate medical courses in tutorial settings is highly desirable. Must have expertise in reviewing and teaching high yield topics in multiple medical Science Subjects. Other than teaching, duties may include planning, coordination and administration of courses. Retired faculties with teaching experience are welcome to apply. Highly competitive salary and benefits. Center is being established by the founder of an international medical school for US and Canadian students (www.sjsm.org). Staff members of the center will have access to wealth of experience, facilities, and career opportunities. Incumbent will be reporting to and communicating with a team of experts stationed in Chicago Corporate Office. Post graduate (PGI/AIIMS) medical qualification from a recognized Institution OR Doctor of Medicine (MD) / Doctor of Surgery (MS) with a current medical license. Applicant must have expertise in reviewing and teaching high yield topics in at least two of the major medical Sc. Subjects. Incumbent will directly report to the CEO and will work closely with the Academic staff in Chicago Office. project_948.description:
**Title:** Creative Director: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this "Overview Jivox enables the worlds top advertisers and agencies to deliver personalized advertising across all screens. Our flagship product, Jivox IQ, is the leading data-driven dynamic ad platform. Its unique architecture enables customers to develop and serve data-driven dynamic ads in a wide variety of formats, including mobile, interactive, expanding, video, native and much more. Several hundred media companies and agencies today use Jivox for their most demanding creative campaigns, including College Humor, Crispin Porter & Bogusky, Federated Media, Digitas, Havas, Hearst, A&E Networks, Martini Media, Merkley + Partners, Razorfish, TVGla, Universal McCann, Videology and Wieden+Kennedy. Stop by our Ad Gallery at http://www.jivox.com to see our ads at work. Position - Senior AdOps Technical Analyst This position requires an individual with good at Campaign Management - Adops, performance driven, effective communication skills. Also, possesses a good understanding of project/time management skills. Responsibilities This position leads our Global Creative and Design team. The Jivox IQ platform allows our agency and publisher clients to deliver dynamic, rich, multi-screen advertising experiences, and your role will be to ensure that our creative meets the highest quality standards. Core responsibilities include concepting new campaigns in the pre-sales process, executing designs for campaigns in production and ensuring design quality across all aspects of delivery. Youll need a keen eye for fresh and innovative design, as well as strong attention to detail. In this role, youll get to work with some of the most famous US and international brands, as well as top agencies and publishers. Day to day responsibilities include: Managing design quality across all campaigns delivered by the Jivox Client Services team. Work with the sales team to concept advertising for major US brands, to be included in sales/marketing pitches. Design ad units for campaigns executed by the Jivox Client Services team. Work with the Jivox global design and creative team to define, maintain and monitor quality standards. Assist in building a global design team to provide scalable design support across multiple time zones, geographies and advertising markets. Design and execute animations for design concepts as well as live campaigns. Assist in the design of Jivox Corporation branding, marketing and sales materials, including Jivox.com. Salary: Best in the Industry Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: Design , Creative , User Experience Role Category:Senior Management Role:Creative Director Keyskills Marketing Branding Advertising Sales Campaigns Campaign Management Major Effective Communication Skills Presales Agency Desired Candidate Profile Desired Skills and Experience 8 10 years of design experience in the advertising industry working with major US brands. Experience with multiple advertising formats including interactive pre-roll, rich media and mobile advertising types. Experience managing junior design resources, and working with globally distributed teams. Excellent Photoshop skills. Excellent Flash animation skills. Experience with HTML5/Javascript is a plus. Experience with other rich media platforms is a plus. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent attention to detail and project management skills. BA or BS degree in relevant subject. **Title:** Sr. Video Editor/ TL: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Introduction We specialize in producing high quality business profile videos, promotional videos, and internal instructional videos, real estate videos for small and mid-sized businesses. We also create artistic wedding videos, family legacy videos, mitzvah videos, Quinceaera videos and wild life videos. Profile & Requirements Able to work independently but also in a team context. Combine a creative eye with respect for deadlines, content requirements and understanding client requirement. Should be responsible for assembling various audio-visual materials into a finished product with a production quality and duration fit viewing on computer or home theatre system. Create a finished video that is highly professional and to the point, starting from graphics, photography, dialogue, raw camera footage, sound effects and other special effects. As a video editor, responsibilities will also include (amongst others) cutting shot sequences to various angles; studying scripts; editing films and footages to include sound effects, dialogue, music and other elements; correcting errors; selecting shots for scenes suitable for the story line; verifying time codes and key numbers; choosing specific visual effects, music and special audio elements; organizing raw footage into a continuous film; reviewing edited videos and assembled films; programming graphic effects; setting up and operating computer editing systems; communicating with team leader/manager to understand clients requirement. Candidate Profile: 5-7 years of production experience with very good verbal and written communication. Must Know FCP and After Effects Knowledge on Wedding video editing and Multi-cam sync with multi cam editing is must. Knowledge on Adobe Audition, Soundtrack pro Good Knowledge on various video codecs and encoding Should be good with MS office Diploma/Graduation related to Multimedia course or Mass communication preferred. project_983.description:
**Title:** Sr.it Recruiter: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Hi, Greeting Form Technosoft..!! Technosoft Corporation, Bangalore is conducting a walkin drive from11th October (Tuesday) to 13th October (Thursday). Interested candidates can walkin to attend the interview starting from 10 AM to 4PM at the below mentioned venue. Technosoft Corporation Cessna Business Park, Embassy Tech Square, 3rd Floor. Signet Building. Bangalore.   This position is a Permanent employment with Technosoft. We are looking for a recruiter, with full cycle recruiting experience, to attract, screen, select and onboard qualified and suitable personnel to fill our job openings. The goal is to attract top talent from our candidates pool, gain competitive advantage and fuel companys growth.
